############################
## Iberia Events
############################
add_namespace = IBR 
add_namespace = IBRtest
add_namespace = caudillo 
add_namespace = iberia #Only to be used for foreign policy chains
add_namespace = ibrwar #Only to be used for Iberian Wars federales tree
add_namespace = ibrterror #Only to be used for terrorism defeat events - Pacifica.
### Abandon Hope, All Ye Who Enter Here. For it is... Infrastructure Week.
country_event = {
	id = IBRtest.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBRtest.1"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_madrid_sixty
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBRtest.1.t
	desc = IBRtest.1.d
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
			IBR_military_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
			IBR_church_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_burocrat_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_business_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_settlers_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_native_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_foreign_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_intellectual_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_majority_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_regional_alignment = 0
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
			IBR_military_alignment = 20
		}
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
			IBR_church_alignment = 20
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_burocrat_alignment = 3
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_business_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_settlers_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_native_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_foreign_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_intellectual_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_majority_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_regional_alignment = 0
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
			IBR_military_alignment = -20
		}
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
			IBR_church_alignment = -20
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_burocrat_alignment = -3
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_business_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_settlers_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_native_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_foreign_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #15 to -15
			IBR_intellectual_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_majority_alignment = 0
		}
		set_variable = { #10 to -10
			IBR_regional_alignment = 0
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 85}
	}
}

	id = IBRtest.2

	option = {
		name = IBRtest.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 35}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 45}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 65}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 85}
	}
}

	id = IBRtest.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBRtest.3"}

	desc = IBRtest.3.d

		name = IBRtest.3.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_to_variable = {IBR_dam_budget = 100}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = IBRtest.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBRtest.4"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_madrid_sixty
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBRtest.4.t
	desc = IBRtest.4.d
	option = {
		name = IBRtest.4.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBR_Terrorism_GUI
		set_country_flag = country_has_gui
		set_country_flag = gui_alert_visible
		set_country_flag = gui_alert_visible_2
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = IBR.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_madrid_sixty
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1.t
	desc = IBR.1.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		date > 1962.1.1
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBR_62_Infrastructure_Start
		set_variable = {
			IBRRoadShadiness = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBRRoadDelay = 0
		}
        hidden_effect = {  
            country_event = { 
                id = IBR.2 
                days = 20
            }
        }
	}
}

### Load Post-Malta Tree

country_event = {
	id = IBR.666
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.666"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_madrid_sixty
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.666.t
	desc = IBR.666.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.666.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_PostMaltaPolitics_Tree
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_post_trium_get_tt
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_caudillo_correct_var
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.27 
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

### Load Anti-Terror Tree

country_event = {
	id = IBR.531
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.531"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_barcelona_smoke
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.531.t
	desc = IBR.531.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		has_country_flag = IBRBarcelonaDefeated
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.531.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
			if = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
			    
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.3116
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.3117
					days = 1
				}
			}
	}
}

### Intial Road Proposal
country_event = {
	id = IBR.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.2"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_meeting_small
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.2.t
	desc = IBR.2.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# More Portuguese Equipment
		set_country_flag = IBR_portuguese_mixers
		set_country_flag = IBR_Road_Approved
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3
				days = 20
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.2.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Just bribe Portugal
		add_political_power = -10
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRRoadShadiness
			value = 1
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.25
					days = 420
				}
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.3
					days = 20
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = IBR_Road_Approved
	}
}

### Asphalt Mixture

country_event = {
	id = IBR.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.3.t
	desc = IBR.3.d
	option = {
		# Spanish Law
		name = IBR.3.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.20
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.8
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.190
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# Federal Law
		name = IBR.3.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -25
		set_country_flag = IBR_Asphalt_Fixed
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.4
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# Make Shit Up
		name = IBR.3.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.13
					days = 14
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRRoadShadiness
				value = 1
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_Asphalt_Fixed
            country_event = {
				id = IBR.4
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
}

### Bombing Event

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_bomb
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4.t
	desc = IBR.4.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.4.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = SpainNoInfra
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.15
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.17
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = IberiaNoInfra
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.14
						days = 5
					}
				}
				50 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.16
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.14
					days = 14
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRRoadShadiness
				value = 1
			}
            country_event = {
				id = IBR.5
				days = 20
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_Road_Fixed
		}
	}
}

### Investigation

country_event = {
	id = IBR.5
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_meeting_table
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5.t
	desc = IBR.5.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadShadiness
						value = 0
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.24
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadShadiness
						value = 1
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.21
						days = 14
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadShadiness
						value = 2
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.22
						days = 21
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadShadiness
						value = 3
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.23
						days = 28
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### Laning Question

country_event = {
	id = IBR.6
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_guy_paper_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6.t
	desc = IBR.6.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.6.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				40 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.9
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
				30 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.10
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
				30 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.11
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.6.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.19
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### """"""""Completed"""""""" Road

country_event = {
	id = IBR.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.7"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.7.t
	desc = IBR.7.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.7.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 0
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 60
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 1
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 120
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 2
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 180
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 3
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 240
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 4
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 300
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 5
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 360
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 6
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 420
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 7
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 480
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 8
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 540
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 9
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 600
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBRRoadDelay
						value = 10
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.18
						days = 660
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

###Portuguese Veto

country_event = {
	id = IBR.8
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.8"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_looking_out_window
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.8.t
	desc = IBR.8.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.8.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -10
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRRoadDelay
			value = 1
		}
		set_country_flag = IBR_Asphalt_Fixed
	}
}

###Spain Denies Permit

country_event = {
	id = IBR.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.10"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.10.t
	desc = IBR.10.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.10.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -10
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRRoadDelay
			value = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.7
				days = 20
			}
		}

###Road Actually Built

country_event = {
	id = IBR.18
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.18"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.18.t
	desc = IBR.18.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.18.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		41 = {
            if = {
                limit = {
                    free_building_slots = {
                        building = infrastructure
                        size > 0
                    }
					OR = {
                        OR = {
                        	region = 214
                        	region = 168
                        	region = 41
                        }
                        NOT = {
                            owner = {
                                any_owned_state = {
                                    free_building_slots = {
                                        building = infrastructure
                                        size > 0
                                    }
                                    OR = {
										region = 214
										region = 168
										region = 41
									}
                                }    
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
				add_building_construction = {
                    type = infrastructure
                    level = 1
                    instant_build = yes
                }
            }
        }
	}
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.46"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_dam_generic
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.46.t
	desc = IBR.46.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.46.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.47
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

###Galician Terror Attack

country_event = {
	id = IBR.55
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.55"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_eta_bombing
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.55.t
	desc = IBR.55.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.55.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_stability = -0.10
		add_manpower = -134
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.56
				days = 2
			}
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
	}
}

###Shaken Iberia

country_event = {
	id = IBR.56
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.56"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes_building
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.56.t
	desc = IBR.56.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.56.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
			
			set_country_flag = Iberia_Wakes_Up
			
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_started_germany_in_flames }}
				
				load_focus_tree = {
					tree = IBR_PostBombingCouncil_Tree
					keep_completed = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_shaken_iberia
					
				hidden_effect = {	
					load_focus_tree = {
						tree = IBR_germany_in_flames_tree_bruh
						keep_completed = yes
					}
				}	
			}
	}
}

#####
# 
# 
# 
#####
##########################################################Iberian Council Tree events

country_event = {
	id = IBR.57
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.57"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.57.t
	desc = IBR.57.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.57.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = advisory_council
		}
		set_country_flag = IBR_council_created_flag
		set_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 15 }
		hidden_effect = { 
	every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.464
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.58
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.58"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.58.t
	desc = IBR.58.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.58.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = legislature_council
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = legislature_council
		}
		TNO_improve_admin_efficiency_low = yes
		set_country_flag = IBR_council_created_flag
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		set_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 15 }
		hidden_effect = { 
	every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.465
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.60
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.60"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_council
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.60.t
	desc = IBR.60.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.60.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBRLibsOwned
		IBR_add_5_authdem = yes
		add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -3}
    	custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_1
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		TNO_improve_political_parties_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.60.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBRLibsUnowned
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRCouncilControl
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_add_3_soclib = yes
		IBR_add_3_soccon = yes
		add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 5}
    	custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_2
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		TNO_worsen_political_parties_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.66
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.66"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes_building
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.66.t
	desc = IBR.66.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.66.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRCouncilPower = IBRCouncilControl
				}
			}
			add_ideas = The_Iberian_Council_2
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRCouncilPower > IBRCouncilControl
				}
			}
			add_ideas = The_Iberian_Council_3
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRRegionalContent > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		country_event = {
			id = IBR.3115
			days = 3
		}
	}
}

	option = {
		name = IBR.1076.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBRBrokeRegionsCouncil
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 0.5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -1}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_9
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_3
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1076.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBREmpoweredRegionsCouncil
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRRegionalContent
			value = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 1}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_4
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		TNO_worsen_minorities_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
	}
}

############################BORMANN TREE EVENTS

country_event = {
	id = IBR.83
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.83"}
	picture = GFX_martin_bormann_intro
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.83.t
	desc = IBR.83.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		has_global_flag = german_civil_war_bormannvic
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = IBRShiftReactionRight
		}
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.83.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = { 	
			limit = { 
			has_country_flag = IBR_supported_speer_flag
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -5}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_8
			}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
			clr_country_flag = IBR_supported_speer_flag
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_field_marshal = { 
				name = "Agustín Muñoz Grandes"
				portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/IBR/Portrait_Iberia_Agustin_Munoz_Grandes.dds"
				skill = 4
				attack_skill = 3
				defense_skill = 4
				planning_skill = 3
				logistics_skill = 3
				traits = { 
					organizer
					thorough_planner
					old_guard 
				}
				id = 1301
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.87
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

				days = 14
			}
		}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.110
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.110"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.110.t
	desc = IBR.110.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		OR = {
			NOT = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
					has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
				}
			}
		has_country_flag = IBRBarcelonaDefeated
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = IBR.110.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_extraordinary_meeting_tree
			keep_completed = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #FLASHPOINT (FALANGE CRASH)
	id = IBR.111
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.111"}
	picture = null
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.111.t
	desc = IBR.111.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.111.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		hidden_effect = {
			load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_economic_bubble
			keep_completed = yes
			}
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.467
				    days = 1
			}
		 }
		 if = {
			limit = {
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = IBR_STABILITY_ROUTE
					option = IBR_STABILITY_ROUTE_COLLAPSE
				}
			}
			IBR = { 
			    set_variable = { IBRIberiaStability = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.1024
				days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
				check_variable = { IBRIberiaStability < 8 }
				check_variable = { IBRIberiaStability > 0.9 }
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = IBRElectionsYES
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_divorce_decision_tt 
			set_country_flag = IBR_divorce_decision_flag
		} 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				IBR = { 
					is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.3003
				}
			}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
					id = IBR.4059
				days = 15
			}
		complete_national_focus = IBR_economic_disaster
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#event the player sees about the autarky crash
	id = IBR.112
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.112"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	title = IBR.112.t
	desc = IBR.112.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.112.a
		add_political_power = -200 
		add_stability = -0.15
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { 
				modifier = IBR_iberian_economy_miracle_dyn_mod
			}
			remove_ideas = Iberian_Economic_Miracle
			add_to_variable = {IBR_inflation_nightmare_variable = 2.0}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_misc_income_nightmare_variable = -0.2}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_gdp_growth_nightmare_variable = -1.5}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.111
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.226
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.226"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_franco_nixon
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	title = IBR.226.t
	desc = IBR.226.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.226.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		add_political_power = 25
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_foreign_alignment = 2}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_foreign_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		IBR = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.230 
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

        ai_chance = {

				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead

				}

        ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_GDP_boost_flat = 0.023 } #already converted to billion
		econ_GDP_boost_once_flat = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_business_alignment = 1}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_businessmen_tt
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.285.b
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		add_political_power = 20
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_church_alignment = -2}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_church_tt
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = { 
			SAU = { 
			country_event = { 
					id = IBR.287
					days = 1
					}   
			}
		}
		
	}
}

	id = IBR.400
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.400"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes_building
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.400.t
	desc = IBR.400.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.400.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_extraordinary_meeting_tree
			keep_completed = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Iberian Council Awaits The Caudillos' Statement
	id = IBR.403
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.403"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_council
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.403.t
	desc = IBR.403.d
	option = { 
		name = IBR.403.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_econ_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.404
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
				has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.415
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
				has_country_flag = cau_council
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.416
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.417
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {			
				AND = {
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.418
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {			
				AND = {
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.419
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.420
				hours = 12
			}
		}
		}
		
	}
	
}

country_event = { #
	id = IBR.404
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.404"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.404.t
	desc = IBR.404.d
	option = { #A return to falangism?
		name = IBR.404.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_economic_tree_paths
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_stability_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.411.t
	desc = IBR.411.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.411.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.005 } 
		econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.413
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.413"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_guy_paper_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.413.t
	desc = IBR.413.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.413.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR_sub_5_marklib = yes
		set_temp_variable = { debt_temp = 0.05 }
		econ_national_debt_change = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_GCW_2
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_GCW_2
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
	}
}

	}

country_event = { #Covertly Supporting A Party?
	id = IBR.459
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.459"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_politicians_discussing
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.459.t
	desc = IBR.459.d
	option = { # Falange-National Union
		name = IBR.459.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		TNO_worsen_political_parties_policy_effectiveness_med = yes
		
		IBR_add_10_authdem = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad } }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.460
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.461
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = IBRelection_helped_UN
	}
	option = { # Alianza Popular
		name = IBR.459.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		TNO_worsen_political_parties_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
		
		IBR_add_5_soccon = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad } }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.460
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.461
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # We need to stay committed to democracy
		name = IBR.459.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad } }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.460
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.461
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Logistical Issues Arise
	id = IBR.460
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.460"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_meeting_table
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.460.t
	desc = IBR.460.d
	option = { # We could use this
		name = IBR.460.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		TNO_worsen_political_parties_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
		
		IBR_sub_10_soclib = yes
		IBR_sub_5_marklib = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.461
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # We actually care so no
		name = IBR.460.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.461
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Election Day
	id = IBR.461
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.461"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_election_line
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.461.t
	desc = IBR.461.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.461.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_voter_intimidation }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.452
					hours = 7
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_libhostility > 2
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_ruralhostility > 1
					}
				}	
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_libhostility > 2
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.5900
						hours = 10
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_ruralhostility > 1
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.5901
						hours = 20
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.466
					hours = 31
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				IBRMilitaryHostility = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Violence At The Polls!
	id = IBR.452
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.452"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_election_line_inside
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.452.t
	desc = IBR.452.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.452.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		IBR_sub_10_authdem = yes
		IBR_add_5_soclib = yes
		IBR_add_3_marklib = yes
		IBR_add_3_soccon = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_libhostility > 2
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_ruralhostility > 1
					}
				}	
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_libhostility > 2
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.5900
						hours = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_election_ruralhostility > 1
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.5901
						hours = 13
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.466
					hours = 24
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Unexpected Urban Turnout
	id = IBR.5900
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5900"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_voting_women
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5900.t
	desc = IBR.5900.d
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad }
			
			add_to_variable = { IBRIRMUDPopularity = 10 }
			add_to_variable = { IBRMarketLiberalPopularity = 20 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { IBRIRMUDPopularity = 20 }
			add_to_variable = { IBRMarketLiberalPopularity = 10 }
		}
	}
	option = { # 
		name = IBR.5900.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad }
			
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = liberal_democracy
				popularity = 0.10	
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_marlib_positive_change
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = liberal_democracy
				popularity = 0.05	
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_soclib_positive_change
		}
		else = {
		
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = liberal_democracy
				popularity = 0.10	
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_soclib_positive_change
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = liberal_democracy
				popularity = 0.05	
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_marlib_positive_change
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.466
				hours = 21
			}
		}
	}
}

				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		else = {

				ideology = conservative_democracy
				popularity = 0.1	
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democracy
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Union Republicana Secures Victory!
	id = IBR.462
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.462"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_torcuato
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.462.t
	desc = IBR.462.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.462.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = liberal_democracy
			last_election = "1970.6.6"
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		} 
		set_party_name = { 
			ideology = liberal_democracy 
			long_name = IBR_CONGRESS_UR_liberal_democracy_party_long 
			name = IBR_CONGRESS_UR_liberal_democracy_party 
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.478
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
		promote_character = IBR_Torcuato_Fernandez_Miranda
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = TNO_Oil_Crisis
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_left_lib_oil keep_completed = yes } 
		}
		else = { 
			load_focus_tree = {
				tree = IBR_politics_left_lib
				keep_completed = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_soclib_victory_tt
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = IBR_Adelino_Palma_dep
		add_ideas = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez_mil
		add_ideas = IBR_Joaquin_Gimenez_for
		add_ideas = IBR_Juan_Garcia_eco
		
		TNO_improve_public_meetings_policy_effectiveness_monthly_med = yes		
		
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				var = IBRMilitaryHostility
				value = 3
			}
			set_variable = {
				var = IBRSoclibReforms
				value = 0
			}
		}
		IBR_check_military_hostility_events = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_milhost_big_tt
		
		set_country_flag = IBRSoclib70Victory
		
	}
}

country_event = { #the event that works out who wins
	id = IBR.466
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.466"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.466.t
	desc = IBR.466.desc
	immediate = { 
		IBR_election_tiebreaker = yes
		clr_country_flag = IBRelection_helped_UN
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.466.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
			    factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_PRD }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UN }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_AP }
				AND = {	
					check_variable = {	IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRIRMUDPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRIzquierdaPopularity }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_election_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { # 
				id = IBR.463 days = 1 
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_voter_intimidation
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_libhostility
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_ruralhostility
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.466.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
			    factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_AP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UN }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_PRD }
				AND = {	
					check_variable = {	IBRMarketLiberalPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRMarketLiberalPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRMarketLiberalPopularity > IBRIRMUDPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRMarketLiberalPopularity > IBRIzquierdaPopularity }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_election_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { # 
				id = IBR.465 days = 1 
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_voter_intimidation
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_libhostility
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_ruralhostility
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.466.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
			    factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_AP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_PRD }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UR }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UN }
				AND = {	
					check_variable = {	IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRIRMUDPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRIzquierdaPopularity }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_election_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { # 
				id = IBR.464 days = 1 
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_voter_intimidation
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_libhostility
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_ruralhostility
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.466.d
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		    modifier = {
			    factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_AP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_PRD }
					has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option =  IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UN }
				}
			}	
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_game_rule = { rule = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE option = IBR_ELECTION_ROUTE_UN }
				AND = {	
					check_variable = {	IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity }
					check_variable = {	IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRIzquierdaPopularity }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_election_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { # 
				id = IBR.462 days = 1 
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_suffrage_bad
		clr_country_flag = IBR_election_auth_voter_intimidation
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_libhostility
		clear_variable =  IBR_election_ruralhostility
	}
	#option = {
	#	name = IBR.466.e
	#	trigger = {
	#		AND = {	
	#			check_variable = {	IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity }
	#			check_variable = {	IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity }
	#			check_variable = {	IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity }

country_event = { #
	id = IBR.473
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.473"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.473.t
	desc = IBR.473.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.473.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIRMUDPopularity < IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRMarketLiberalPopularity < IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRNationalUnionPopularity < IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
					}
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = { #
					id = IBR.477
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity < IBRIRMUDPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRMarketLiberalPopularity < IBRIRMUDPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRNationalUnionPopularity < IBRIRMUDPopularity
					}
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = { #
					id = IBR.475
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity < IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRIRMUDPopularity < IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRNationalUnionPopularity < IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
					}
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = { #
					id = IBR.476
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIRMUDPopularity < IBRNationalUnionPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRMarketLiberalPopularity < IBRNationalUnionPopularity
					}
					check_variable = {
						IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity < IBRNationalUnionPopularity
					}
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = { #
					id = IBR.474
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIRMUDPopularity = IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
							}
						}
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = { #
							id = IBR.477
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = { #
							id = IBR.475
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIRMUDPopularity = IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
							}
						}
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRMarketLiberalPopularity > IBRNationalUnionPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRMarketLiberalPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = { #
							id = IBR.477
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
				50 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = { #
							id = IBR.476
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIRMUDPopularity = IBRNationalUnionPopularity
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRIRMUDPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
							}
						}
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {

						country_event = { #

							days = 3
						}
					}
				}

						country_event = { #
							id = IBR.474
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity = IBRNationalUnionPopularity
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBRAlianzaPopularPopularity > IBRIRMUDPopularity
							}
						}
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBRNationalUnionPopularity > IBRMarketLiberalPopularity
							}

					}

							}

							days = 3

country_event = {
	id = IBR.500
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.500"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_crate_of_guns
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.500.t
	desc = IBR.500.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		AND = {
		NOT = {
		has_country_flag = barcelona_started
		}
		OR = {
		date > 1965.4.4
		has_country_flag = reactionfinished
		}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.500.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Investigate
		
			set_country_flag = barcelona_started
			
			if = {
				limit = { IBR = { has_country_leader = { character = IBR_Francisco_Franco ruling_only = yes}} }
				
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.502
						days = 3
					}
				}
				
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_barcelona_franco_tt
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { IBR = { has_country_leader = { character = IBR_Antonio_Salazar ruling_only = yes} } }
				
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.501
						days = 3
					}	
				}
				
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_barcelona_salazar_tt
			}
			else = {
			
				hidden_effect = {
					random_list = {
						50 = {
							IBR = {
								country_event = {
									id = IBR.501
									days = 3
								}
							}
						}
						50 = {
							IBR = {
								country_event = {
									id = IBR.502
									days = 3
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = advisory_council
							has_country_flag = legislature_council
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = advisory_council
				
				hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					days = 1
					id = IBR.57
				}
				}
			}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.507
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.507"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_filing_cabinet
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.507.t
	desc = IBR.507.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.507.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -10
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.513
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.508
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.508"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberian_wars_11
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.508.t
	desc = IBR.508.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.508.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.522
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 0.5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.513
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.513"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cnt_flag
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.513.t
	desc = IBR.513.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.513.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -150
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.514
					days = 1
				}
			}
			every_country = {
					news_event = {
						id = WORLD.466
						days = 1
					}
			}
			BRG = {
				set_country_flag = BRG_GP_Kondor_Regional_Unrest_Unlock
			}
		}

		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_really_big_tt
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.515
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.515"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cnt_anarchists
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.515.t
	desc = IBR.515.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.515.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Bombard the city!
		add_political_power = -50
		add_manpower = -5000
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.516
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
				80 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.517
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3105
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.515.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Navally bombard the city!
		add_political_power = -50
		add_manpower = -5000
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				5 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.518
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
				95 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.519
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3105
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.515.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Roll in the tanks!
		add_political_power = -50
		add_manpower = -5000
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				30 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.520
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
				70 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.521
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3105
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #good
	id = IBR.516
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.516"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_big_guns
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.516.t
	desc = IBR.516.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.516.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 150
		add_manpower = -2000
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		986 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 0.1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.530
				days = 1
			}
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #not great, not terrible
	id = IBR.517
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.517"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_barcelona_rubble
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.517.t
	desc = IBR.517.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.517.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -75
		add_manpower = -4000
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		
		986 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 0.3
			}
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.530
				days = 1
			}
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.518
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.518"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_italy_naval_ship
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.518.t
	desc = IBR.518.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.518.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 200
		add_manpower = -500
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.530
				days = 1
			}
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #CNT Rises Against Army Occupation
	id = IBR.522
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.522"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cnt_barricades
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.522.t
	desc = IBR.522.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.522.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = legislature_council }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						IBR = {
							country_event = {
								id = IBR.525
								days = 2
							}
						}
					}
					70 = {
						IBR = {
							country_event = {
								id = IBR.527
								days = 2
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						IBR = {
							country_event = {
								id = IBR.527
								days = 2
							}
						}
					}
					70 = {
						IBR = {
							country_event = {
								id = IBR.525
								days = 2
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3105
				days = 1
			}
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
	}
}

	id = IBR.524
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.524"}

		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

		add_manpower = -3000

				}
			}

				id = IBR.3105
				days = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.466
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {

		add_manpower = -2500
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.518
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
				80 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.519
							days = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.527.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

country_event = {
	id = IBR.530
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.530"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_barcelona_smoke
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.530.t
	desc = IBR.530.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.530.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBRBarcelonaDefeated
		hidden_effect = {
		
			#REMOVED TERRORISM FOR AI FOR TIME BEING TO SEE WHAT HAPPENS
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no}
				IBR = {
					country_event = { #ticker
						id = IBR.540
						days = 62
					}
				}
			}
		    country_event = { #load barcelona burns tree (barcelona_burns)
				id = IBR.531
				days = 3
			}
		
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_AAS_Resources = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_CNT_Activity = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_CNT_Resources = 1.5
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_CNT_Support = 1.5
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_TBA_Activity = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_TBA_Resources = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_TBA_Support = 0.5
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_ETA_Activity = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_ETA_Resources = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_ETA_Support = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_FSLP_Activity = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_FSLP_Resources = 2
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_FSLP_Support = 1
		}
		set_variable = { IBR_AAS_offensive_decision_ticker = 1 }
		hidden_effect = { 
			IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes 
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Axencia Finds Uptick in Separatist Activity
	id = IBR.5500
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5500"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_AAS_logo
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5500.t
	desc = IBR.5500.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5500.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5501
				days = 40
			}
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_terrorism_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		
	}
}

			}

		}

country_event = { #CHECK EVENT FOR CAUDILLO POP IN 5509
	id = IBR.5515
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5515"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.5515.t
	desc = IBR.5515.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5515.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
		limit = {
		check_variable = {
                            var = IBR_ETA_Support
                            value = 3
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals
                        }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.548
				hours = 1
			}
		    }
			IBR = { 
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5516
				days = 40
			}
			}
		}
		}
		else = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5509
				hours = 1
			}
		}
		}
	}
}
#BALANCE AAS RESOURCES BELOW
country_event = { #CHECK EVENT FOR AAS SUPPORT IN IBR.5510/11
	id = IBR.5516
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5516"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.5516.t
	desc = IBR.5516.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5516.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = {
		#IS THIS BALANCED???? LOOKS LIKE IT IS LOL
				check_variable = {
         	    	var = IBR_AAS_Resources
            		value = 10
            		compare = greater_than_or_equals
                }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5510
					hours = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5511
					hours = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = IBR.5520.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_franco_speech
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5520.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_AAS_chain_start
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_AAS_chain_start_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_regional_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_regional_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5521
				days = 23
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Dealing With the Bureaucrats
	id = IBR.5529
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5529"}
	title = IBR.5529.t
	desc = IBR.5529.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_looking_out_window
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #Start off strong
		name = IBR.5529.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBR_burocrat_alignment > -3.1
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5530
					days = 4
				}
			}	
		}
		else = {
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5531
					days = 4
				}
			}	
		}
	}
	option = { #Offer a compromise
		name = IBR.5529.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5532
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Axencia Making Great Strides
	id = IBR.5535
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5535"}
	title = IBR.5535.t
	desc = IBR.5535.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_AAS_logo
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5535.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_AAS_chain_goodending_tt
		
		add_political_power = 25
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_tt
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_AAS_2
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_2
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		
		TNO_improve_security_policy_effectiveness_med = yes
		TNO_improve_admin_efficiency_low = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_AAS_chain_goodending
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3101
				days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Removing the Compromised
	id = IBR.5538
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5538"}
	title = IBR.5538.t
	desc = IBR.5538.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_interview
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #Fire the corrupt administrators
		name = IBR.5538.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5539
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Prosecute every single one!
		name = IBR.5538.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 4
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_big_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -4
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5539
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

			value = -2
		}

			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5540
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}

		}

		}

		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5540
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Changes to the AAS
	id = IBR.5540
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5540"}
	title = IBR.5540.t
	desc = IBR.5540.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_interview
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #Increase oversight
		name = IBR.5540.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_army_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5541
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #A thorough restructuring is needed!
		name = IBR.5540.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_big_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_army_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5541
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #A Reformed Axencia
	id = IBR.5541
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5541"}
	title = IBR.5541.t
	desc = IBR.5541.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_AAS_logo
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5541.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_AAS_chain_goodending
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_AAS_chain_goodending_tt
		
		add_political_power = 75
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_majority_tt
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -5}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_AAS_1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -5}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_1
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 4
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		}
		
		TNO_improve_security_policy_effectiveness_med = yes
		TNO_improve_admin_efficiency_low = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3101
				days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

				id = IBR.5543
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Expand the scope
		name = IBR.5542.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt

			}
		}
	}
