country_event = { #Franco's AAS, a Public Mockery
	id = IBR.5548
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5548"}
	title = IBR.5548.t
	desc = IBR.5548.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_AAS_logo
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5548.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_AAS_chain_worstending
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_AAS_chain_worstending_tt
		
		add_stability = -0.1
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_majority_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 5}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_AAS_5
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 5}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_5
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1.5
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		}
		
		TNO_worsen_security_policy_effectiveness_med = yes
		
		TNO_worsen_admin_efficiency_low = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Support
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Support
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Support
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Support
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_small_tt
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3101
				days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #An Unlikely Voice Speaks Up
	id = IBR.5549
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5549"}
	title = IBR.5549.t
	desc = IBR.5549.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_interview
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #Raise the issue to AAS higher ups
		name = IBR.5549.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBR_burocrat_alignment > -3.1
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
			
			70 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5526
						days = 4
					}
				}
			}
			30 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5550
						days = 4
					}
				}
			}
			}
			}			
		}
		else = {
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5550
					days = 4
				}
			}	
		}
	}
	option = { #This is too risky...
		name = IBR.5549.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5551
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Large Numbers of Bureaucrats Slip Up
	id = IBR.5555
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5555"}
	title = IBR.5555.t
	desc = IBR.5555.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_politicians_discussing
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5555.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5556
				days = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Confronting the Axencia Leadership
	id = IBR.5556
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5556"}
	title = IBR.5556.t
	desc = IBR.5556.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_big_meeting
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5556.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_a_few_slip_up_aas
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_several_willing_aas
						check_variable = {
							IBR_burocrat_alignment < -3
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5557
					days = 5
				}
			}				
		}
		else = {
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5559
					days = 5
				}
			}	
		}
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_several_willing_aas
		clr_country_flag = IBR_a_few_slip_up_aas
	}
}

country_event = { #A Lenient Deal with AAS Bureaucrats
	id = IBR.5557
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5557"}
	title = IBR.5557.t
	desc = IBR.5557.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_meeting_small
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5557.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5558
				days = 16
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #AAS Still Struggling
	id = IBR.5558
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5558"}
	title = IBR.5558.t
	desc = IBR.5558.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_AAS_logo
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5558.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_AAS_chain_badending
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_AAS_chain_badending_tt
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_AAS_4
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_4
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		}
		
		TNO_worsen_security_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Activity
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Activity
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Activity
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Activity
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_activity_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_activity_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_activity_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_activity_small_tt
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3101
				days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #AAS Bureaucrats Accept Harsh Terms
	id = IBR.5559
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5559"}
	title = IBR.5559.t
	desc = IBR.5559.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_politicians_discussing
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5559.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_AAS_chain_midending
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_AAS_chain_midending_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_AAS_Resources
			value = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_big_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_AAS_3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_3
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		
		TNO_improve_security_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3101
				days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

#Military branch: "A less confrontational approach is needed"

country_event = { #Approaching the Military
	id = IBR.5560
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5560"}
	title = IBR.5560.t
	desc = IBR.5560.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_looking_out_window
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #Question the ones in our sights
		name = IBR.5560.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5561
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Expand the scope
		name = IBR.5560.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_army_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5570
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #An Unlikely Voice Speaks Up
	id = IBR.5570
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5570"}
	title = IBR.5570.t
	desc = IBR.5570.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_interview
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	
	option = { #Raise the issue to higher ups in the military
		name = IBR.5570.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBR_military_alignment > 4.9
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
			
			70 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5527
						days = 4
					}
				}
			}
			30 = {
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5571
						days = 4
					}
				}
			}
			}
			}			
		}
		else = {
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5571
					days = 4
				}
			}	
		}
	}
	option = { #This is too risky...
		name = IBR.5570.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5572
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_aas_big_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_army_tt
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_AAS_3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_3
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		
		TNO_improve_security_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		set_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_caudillo_correct_var = 1}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3101
				days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_majority_tt

			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}

		}

				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}

			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_AAS_5
		}

			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1.5
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1
			}

		}

		TNO_worsen_admin_efficiency_low = yes

			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Support
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Support
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_small_tt
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_pp_economics_get_tt
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium

country_event = { #Opus dei1
	id = IBR.5700
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5700"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5700.t
	desc = IBR.5700.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5700.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		IBR = {
		    add_to_variable = {
		    	var = poverty_counter
		    	value = -12
		    }
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
				has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_majority_tt
		
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_majority_alignment
				value = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
				has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_majority_tt
		
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_majority_alignment
				value = 1
			}
		}
		IBR_sub_3_marklib = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 1}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_econ_5
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -1}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_econ_5
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Support
			value = 0.5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Support
			value = 0.5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Support
			value = 0.5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Support
			value = 0.5
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
					has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco 
				} 
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_small_tt
		
	}
}

	id = IBR.5704
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5704"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_orenburg_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5704.t
	desc = IBR.5704.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5704.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		IBR = {
		    add_to_variable = {
		    	var = poverty_counter
		    	value = -24
		    }
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = -3
		}
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -6}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_econ_8
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -4 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_econ_8
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Support
			value = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Support
			value = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Support
			value = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Support
			value = 2
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -3.5
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_really_big_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_mid_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_mid_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_mid_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_mid_tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = IBR_STABILITY_ROUTE
					option = IBR_STABILITY_ROUTE_COLLAPSE
				}
			}
			IBR = { 
			    set_variable = { IBRIberiaStability = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.1024
					days = 3
				}
			}
		} 
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { IBRIberiaStability < 8 }
					check_variable = { IBRIberiaStability > 0.9 }
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = IBRElectionsYES
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_divorce_decision_tt 
			set_country_flag = IBR_divorce_decision_flag 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					IBR = { 
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.3003
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.4059
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = advisory_council
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.701
						days = 5
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.700
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}	
	}
}

#Positive Salazar events

country_event = { #Salazar Good Economy 1
	id = IBR.5705
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5705"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_salazar_writing_desk
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5705.t
	desc = IBR.5705.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5705.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = 50
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.2 } #already converted to percent 
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		TNO_improve_poverty_low = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -4}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_econ_10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 3 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_econ_10
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #

			var = IBR_au_oppression
			value = 3
		}

	id = IBR.5771
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5771"}
	title = IBR.5771.t
	desc = IBR.5771.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Increase surveillance on them
		name = IBR.5771.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_au_push_envelope }
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5772
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5773
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Fabricate evidence on their leaders
		name = IBR.5771.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5774
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Eve of the Council Elections
	id = IBR.5782
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5782"}
	title = IBR.5782.t
	desc = IBR.5782.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5782.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_au_push_envelope }
						has_country_flag = IBR_au_close_down
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_au_push_envelope }
						has_country_flag = IBR_au_push_hard
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_au_close_down
						has_country_flag = IBR_au_push_hard
					}
				}
			}
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5783
					hours = 13
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5784
					hours = 23
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Polls Close
	id = IBR.5784
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5784"}
	title = IBR.5784.t
	desc = IBR.5784.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5784.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = {
					IBR_au_oppression > 8.9
				}
			}
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5788
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = {
					IBR_au_oppression > 5.9
				}
			}
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5787
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = {
					IBR_au_oppression > 2.9
				}
			}
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5786
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5785
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				}
			}
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5789
					hours = 5
				}
			}
		}
		if = {

					has_country_flag = IBR_au_preparations
				}
			}

				}

		}

				}
			}

			var = IBR_au_libs_triggered
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_anger_libs_small_tt

			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_au_preparations }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5792
					hours = 35
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					check_variable = {
						IBR_au_libs_triggered > 2.9
					}
				}
			
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5794
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}

				limit = {

					}
				}	
		
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5797
						days = 2
					}
					}
			}
			if = {

					}
				}
			
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5800
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #For the Safety of Iberia
	id = IBR.5821
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5821"}
	title = IBR.5821.t
	desc = IBR.5821.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Mass surveillance of the problematic populations
		name = IBR.5821.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { activity_temp_variable = 0 } 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_CNT_Activity} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_ETA_Activity} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_TBA_Activity} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_FSLP_Activity}
		set_temp_variable = { support_temp_variable = 0 } 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_CNT_Support} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_ETA_Support} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_TBA_Support} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_FSLP_Support}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {activity_temp_variable > support_temp_variable }
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5824
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5823
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Intensified targeted surveillance
		name = IBR.5821.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { activity_temp_variable = 0 } 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_CNT_Activity} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_ETA_Activity} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_TBA_Activity} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_FSLP_Activity}
		set_temp_variable = { support_temp_variable = 0 } 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_CNT_Support} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_ETA_Support} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_TBA_Support} 
	        add_to_temp_variable = {support_temp_variable = IBR_FSLP_Support}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {activity_temp_variable > support_temp_variable }
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity > IBR_ETA_Activity }
					check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity > IBR_TBA_Activity }
					check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity > IBR_FSLP_Activity }
					NOT = {has_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken }
				}
				
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5825
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { IBR_TBA_Activity > IBR_ETA_Activity }
					check_variable = { IBR_TBA_Activity > IBR_CNT_Activity }
					check_variable = { IBR_TBA_Activity > IBR_FSLP_Activity }
					NOT = {has_country_flag = IBRTBABroken }
				}
				
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5827
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { IBR_FSLP_Activity > IBR_ETA_Activity }
					check_variable = { IBR_FSLP_Activity > IBR_TBA_Activity }
					check_variable = { IBR_FSLP_Activity > IBR_CNT_Activity }
					NOT = {has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken }
				}
				
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5829
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { NOT = {has_country_flag = IBRETABroken}}
				
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5826
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5830
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#### TERROR EVENTS
#### THE GRAND INFLUENCE TICKERS - DO NOT TOUCH

country_event = {
	id = IBR.540
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.540"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.540.t
	desc = IBR.540.d
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken
					}
					is_ai = no
				}
				IBR_CNT_ticker = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = IBRTBABroken
					}
					is_ai = no
				}
				IBR_TBA_ticker = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = IBRETABroken
					}
					is_ai = no
				}
				IBR_ETA_ticker = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
					}
					is_ai = no
				}
				IBR_FSLP_ticker = yes
			}
			IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes
			IBR_AAS_resources_ticker = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.540.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
			set_temp_variable = { activity_temp_variable = 0 } 
			add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_CNT_Activity} 
			add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_ETA_Activity} 
			add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_TBA_Activity} 
			add_to_temp_variable = {activity_temp_variable = IBR_FSLP_Activity}
	
			if = {
			    limit = {
					check_variable = {
                        var = activity_temp_variable
                        value = 30
                        compare = greater_than_or_equals    
                    }
			    }
			        random_list = {
			                80 = {
							    ZZZ = {
			                    country_event = {
				                    id = IBR.546
				                    hours = 1
			                    }
								}
							}	
			                20 = {}
			        }
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    AND = {
						check_variable = {
                            var = activity_temp_variable
                            value = 20
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals
                        }
					    check_variable = {
							activity_temp_variable < 30
						}
					}
			    }
			        random_list = {
			                60 = {
							    ZZZ = {
			                    country_event = {
				                    id = IBR.546
				                    hours = 1
			                    }
								}
							}	
			                40 = {}
			        }
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    AND = {
						check_variable = {
                            var = activity_temp_variable
                            value = 10
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals
                        }
					    check_variable = {
							activity_temp_variable < 20
						}
					}
			    }
			        random_list = {
			                40 = {
							    ZZZ = {
			                    country_event = {
				                    id = IBR.546
				                    hours = 1
			                    }
								}
							}	
			                60 = {}
			        }
		    }
			if = {
			    limit = {
				    AND = {
						check_variable = {
                            var = activity_temp_variable
                            value = 0
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals
                        }
					    check_variable = {
							activity_temp_variable < 10
						}
					}
			    }
			        random_list = {
			                20 = {
							    ZZZ = {
			                    country_event = {
				                    id = IBR.546
				                    hours = 1
			                    }
								}
							}	
			                80 = {}
			        }
		    }
			
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken
						has_country_flag = IBRTBABroken
						has_country_flag = IBRETABroken
						has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
					}
				}
			}
			
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.540
				days = 27
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = IBR.546
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.546"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.546.t
	desc = IBR.546.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.546.a
		
		trigger = {
            AND = {
				check_variable = {
                    var = IBR.IBR_CNT_Activity
                    value = 1
                    compare = greater_than_or_equals
                }
			    NOT = {
				IBR = {
					has_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken
                }					
				}
				NOT = {
				IBR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
                }					
				}
			}				
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
					AND = {
						check_variable = {
                            var = IBR.IBR_CNT_Activity
                            value = 1
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals
                        }
					    check_variable = {
							IBR.IBR_CNT_Activity < 2
						}
					}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
					AND = {
						check_variable = {
                            var = IBR.IBR_CNT_Activity
                            value = 2
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals
                        }
					    check_variable = {
							IBR.IBR_CNT_Activity < 3
						}
					}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 30

                            value = 3
                            compare = greater_than_or_equals

		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.550
				hours = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.546.f
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.01
			
			modifier = {
			factor = 100000
			AND = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { IBR.IBR_CNT_Activity < 1 }
				IBR = { 
				    has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled 
			    }
			}
			OR = {
				check_variable = { IBR.IBR_ETA_Activity < 1 }
				IBR = { 
				    has_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Rolled 
			    }
			}
			OR = {
				check_variable = { IBR.IBR_TBA_Activity < 1 }
				IBR = { 
				    has_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Rolled 
			    }
			}
			OR = {
				check_variable = { IBR.IBR_FSLP_Activity < 1 }
				IBR = { 
				    has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled 
			    }
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		IBR = {
		clr_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
		}
		IBR = {
		clr_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Rolled
		}
		IBR = {
		clr_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Rolled
		}
		IBR = {
		clr_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
		}
		
	}
}

country_event = { #CNT ATTACK (ZZZ)
	id = IBR.547
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.547.t
	desc = IBR.547.d
	immediate = {
	    log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.547"
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						IBR_CNT_Resources < 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources > 0
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources < 1
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 0
						}
					}
			}		
            if = {
			    limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_1    
				}
				set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				ZZZ = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
			    IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.551
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources > 1
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources < 2
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 1
						}
					}
				}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_2    
				}
				set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				ZZZ = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
			    IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.552
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}	
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources > 2
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources < 3
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 2
						}
					}
				}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_3    
				}
				set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				ZZZ = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
			    IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.553
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}	
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources > 3
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources < 4
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 3
						}
					}
				}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_4    
				}
				set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				ZZZ = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
			    IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.554
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}	
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources > 4
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources < 6
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 4
						}
					}
				}
			if = {
			    limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_5    
				}
				set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				ZZZ = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
			    IBR = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.555
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}	
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources > 6
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_CNT_Resources < 8
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 6
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_6
						has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_6_2
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
				else_if = {
			        limit = {
				        NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_6 }
				    }
					
					random_list = {
					50 = {
				    IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.556
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					50 = {
					IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.587
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					}
				}
			    else = {
					IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.556
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.587
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}	
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources > 8
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_CNT_Resources = 8
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_7
						has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_7_2
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
				else_if = {
			        limit = {
				        NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Attack_7 }
				    }
					random_list = {
					50 = {
				    IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.557
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					50 = {
					IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.588
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					}
				}
			    else = {
				
					IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.557
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.588
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.547.a
	}
}

						    days = 1

						    id = IBR.591
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							IBR_TBA_Resources > 8
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_TBA_Resources = 8
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Attack_7
						has_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Attack_7_2
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
				else_if = {
			        limit = {
				        NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Attack_7 }
				    }
				  
					random_list = {
					50 = {
				    IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.571
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					50 = {
					IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.592
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					}
			    }
			    else = {
					IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.571
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.592
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.549.a
	}
}

country_event = { #FSLP ATTACK
	id = IBR.550
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.550.t
	desc = IBR.550.d
	immediate = {
	    log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.550"
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources > 0
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources < 1
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 0
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_1
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			    else = {
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.572
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources > 1
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources < 2
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_2
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			    else = {
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.573
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources > 2
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources < 3
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 2
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_3
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			    else = {
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.574
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources > 3
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources < 4
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 3
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_4
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			    else = {
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.575
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources > 4
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources < 6
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 4
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_5
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {
					    country_event = {
						id = IBR.546
						hours = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			    else = {
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.576
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources > 6
							}
							check_variable = {
								IBR_FSLP_Resources < 8
							}
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 6
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_6
						has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_6_2
				    }
					set_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
				    ZZZ = {

						hours = 1
					    }
				    }

						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}

					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.593
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
					}
					}
			    }
			    else = {

					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.577
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			        IBR = {
					    country_event = {
						    id = IBR.593
						    days = 1
					    }
				    }
			    }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources > 8
						}
						check_variable = {
							IBR_FSLP_Resources = 8
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
			        limit = {
				        has_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Attack_7

					    }

		}

		clr_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Rolled
		clr_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Rolled
		clr_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled

		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 4
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 1302
			}
		}
		remove_unit_leader = 1302
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.589
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.589"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_eta_bombing2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.589.t
	desc = IBR.589.d
	option = {
		# Yay
		name = IBR.589.a
		if = {
			limit =  { has_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Attack_6}
			
			set_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Attack_6_2
		}
		IBR = {
			set_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Attack_6
		}
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_CNT_Rolled
		clr_country_flag = IBR_ETA_Rolled
		clr_country_flag = IBR_TBA_Rolled
		clr_country_flag = IBR_FSLP_Rolled
		
		add_political_power = -100
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
	}
}

#EVENTS TO GET AROUND GUI WEIRDNESS FOR CHECK LMAO
#THIS IN PARTICULAR MAKES IT HARDER TO BUY DOWN LOW TERROR VARS
###ALL EVENTS HIDDEN AND TAKEN BY ZZZ###


##CNT EVENTS 
country_event = { #CNT ACTIVITY
	id = IBR.9100
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.9100"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.9100.t
	desc = IBR.9100.d
	immediate = {
	
	if = {
		limit = {IBR = { check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity < 2.1} }}
		
		IBR = {
		add_to_variable = { 
		    var = IBR_CNT_Activity 
			value = -0.4
		}
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { 
			IBR = {
				check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity < 3.1 } 
				OR = {
					check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity = 2.1 } 
					check_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity > 2.1 }
				}
			}
		}
		IBR = { set_variable = { IBR_CNT_Activity = 2 }}
	}
	else = {
		IBR = {
		add_to_variable = { 
		    var = IBR_CNT_Activity 
			value = -1
		}
		}

	}
	IBR = { IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes }
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.9100.a
	}
}

#TERRORISM IS DEAD

country_event = { #CNT IS DEAD
	id = ibrterror.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ibrterror.1"}
 	title = ibrterror.1.t
 	desc = ibrterror.1.d
 	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cnt_flag
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
 	
 	option = {
 		name = ibrterror.1.a
		add_political_power = 100
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		set_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken
		clamp_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Activity
			min = -1
			max = 0
		}
		clamp_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Resources
			min = -1
			max = 0
		}
		clamp_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Support
			min = -1
			max = 0
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
					has_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken
					has_country_flag = IBRETABroken
					has_country_flag = IBRTBABroken
				}
				country_event = { id = ibrterror.5 days = 2 }
			}
		}
 	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.600
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.600"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.600.t
	desc = IBR.600.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.600.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.601
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.600.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.602
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = IBR.601.d

				}
			}
		}

				country_event = {

					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Investigating Election Fraud
	id = IBR.613
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.613"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_voting_women
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.613.t
	desc = IBR.613.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.613.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_political_power > 49
			}
			random_list = {
				80 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.802
						days = 7
					}
					set_country_flag = IBRFraudInvestigationWon
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.801
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					has_political_power < 50
					has_political_power > -49
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				30 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.802
						days = 7
					}
					set_country_flag = IBRFraudInvestigationWon
				}
				70 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.801
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.801
				days = 7
			}
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Legalizing The Left Opposition
	id = IBR.618
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.618"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_politicians_discussing
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.618.t
	desc = IBR.618.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.618.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Do as we promised, no banned parties.
		
		add_stability = 0.075
		
		add_ideas = tno_trade_unions_all_allowed
		
		TNO_improve_political_parties_policy_effectiveness_high = yes 
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 2
		}
		IBR_check_military_hostility_events = yes
		IBR_add_10_soclib = yes
		IBR_sub_5_socdem = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = socialist
			popularity = 0.04
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = communist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_milhost_big_tt

		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSoclibReforms
			value = 3
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.618.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Walk back on our remarks, to not anger people.
		
		add_political_power = -50
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.805
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

	option = {
		name = IBR.806.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Arrest him!
		IBR_add_5_soclib = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_check_military_hostility_events = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_milhost_small_tt
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSoclibReforms
			value = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.806.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# It is too dangerous.
		IBR_sub_10_soclib = yes
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_milhost_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = -50
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSoclibReforms
			value = -1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Investigating Military Corruption
	id = IBR.621
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.621"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_looking_out_window
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.621.t
	desc = IBR.621.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.621.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# A perfect opportunity to neuter a potential threat.
		
		IBR_add_15_soclib = yes
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = 50
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				subtract_from_variable = {
					var = IBRMilitaryHostility
					value = 1
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_milhost_small_tt
			}
			50 = {
				add_to_variable = {
					var = IBRMilitaryHostility
					value = 3
				}
				IBR_check_military_hostility_events = yes
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_milhost_big_tt
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSoclibReforms
			value = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.621.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Justice is foremost.
		
		IBR_add_5_soclib = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSoclibReforms
			value = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.621.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Perhaps we can earn their trust?
		
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { IBRMilitaryHostility > 3}}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5852
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5853
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		IBR_sub_5_soclib = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_soclib_milcorruption
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSoclibReforms
			value = -1
		}
	}
}

					has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_decent
					has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_good

			}

				value = 9
			}
			IBR_check_military_hostility_events = yes
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.808
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.808"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_guy_paper_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.808.t
	desc = IBR.808.d
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.808.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Probably a fake, but investigate it.
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_good
					has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_decent
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.809
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.811
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { # Increase security around our Deputies.
		name = IBR.808.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_congress_protected
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.810
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.811
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}

	}
	option = { # Perhaps those officers can get a surprise re-assignment...
		name = IBR.808.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_politial_connections
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5861
					days = 12
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.811
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Irregular Assistance?
	id = IBR.812
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.812"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_looking_out_window
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.812.t
	desc = IBR.812.d
	option = { # Turn a blind eye.
		name = IBR.812.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { IBRSoclibReforms > 2}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5862
					days = 2
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_soclib_leftists_epic
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5863
					days = 2
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_soclib_leftists_cringe
		}
	}
	option = { # The rule of law is crucial.
		name = IBR.812.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
	
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = socialist
			popularity = -0.01
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_house_lost
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5864
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.813
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Battle Of Madrid (after winning chamber of deputies)
	id = IBR.813
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.813"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberian_wars_10
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.813.t
	desc = IBR.813.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.813.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_politial_connections
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_congress_protected
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_good
					has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_decent
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.819
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_leftists_epic
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5865
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5866
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Battle Of Madrid (after losing chamber of deputies)
	id = IBR.5864
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5864"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberian_wars_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5864.t
	desc = IBR.5864.d
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5864.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_soclib_leftists_cringe
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5868
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5867
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Clearing the City
	id = IBR.5865
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5865"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberian_wars_6
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5865.t
	desc = IBR.5865.d
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5865.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				80 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.819
						days = 4
					}
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.820
						days = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			var = IBRIberiaStability

		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.820
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
	
		hidden_effect = {
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.815
					days = 3
				}
			}
			50 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.816
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Officers' Trial
	id = IBR.817
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.817"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_prison_jail_cell
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.817.t
	desc = IBR.817.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.817.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Sentence them to prison
		
		IBR_add_10_soclib = yes
		IBR_sub_10_soccon = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.817.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Sentence them to death
		
		IBR_add_10_soclib = yes
		IBR_sub_10_socdem = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Battle Is Lost
	id = IBR.818
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.818"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_falange_standard_bearers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.818.t
	desc = IBR.818.d
	immediate = { set_country_flag = IBR_soclib_coup_happened }
	option = {
		name = IBR.818.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		IBR = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = IBR_MILITARYCOUP
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = fascism
				long_name = IBR_fascism_coup_long
				name = IBR_fascism_coup
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Alfonso Armada"
				desc = "POLITICS_ALFONSO_ARMADA_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Afonso_Armada.dds"
				expire = "1981.10.20"
				ideology = fascism_corporatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { 
			ideology = fascism 
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		add_popularity = { 
			ideology = despotism 
			popularity = -0.2
		}
		add_popularity = { 
			ideology = authoritarian_democracy
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 0
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_politial_connections
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_congress_protected
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_good
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_decent 
		clr_country_flag = IBRDemUnion
		
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.1500
				    days = 1
			    }
			}
			set_country_flag = TNO_closing_screen_show
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_iberia_closing_screen_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #The Battle Is Won!
	id = IBR.819
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.819"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_madrid_plaza_de_oriente
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.819.t
	desc = IBR.819.d
	immediate = { set_country_flag = IBR_soclib_coup_happened }
	option = {
		name = IBR.819.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Victory!
		country_event = {
			id = IBR.814
			days = 3
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		set_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 0
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_politial_connections
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_congress_protected
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_good
		clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_decent 
		
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.1502
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Counter-Coup In Eastern Iberia!
	id = IBR.820
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.820"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_falange_rally
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.820.t
	desc = IBR.820.d
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = IBR_soclib_coup_happened
			clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_politial_connections
			clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_congress_protected
			clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_good
			clr_country_flag = IBR_soclib_aas_decent
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_id = 1301
						has_id = 1302
						has_id = 1304
						has_id = 1305
						has_id = 1308
						has_id = 1317
						has_id = 1319
						has_id = 1310
						has_id = 1313
						has_id = 1301
						has_id = 1314
						has_id = 1318
					}
				}
    	        set_nationality = SPA
    	    }
			SPA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 1305 } 
					promote_leader = yes
				}
				create_field_marshal = { 
					name = "Kaúlza de Arriaga"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/GNS/Portrait_GNS_Kaulza_de_Arriaga.dds"
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 3
					defense_skill = 2
					planning_skill = 2
					logistics_skill = 3
					traits = {
				    	offensive_doctrine
					}
					id = 1580
				}
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "José Manuel Bettencourt Rodrigues"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/GNS/Portrait_GNS_Jose_Manuel_Bettencourt_Rodrigues.dds"
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 2
					defense_skill = 3
					planning_skill = 2
					logistics_skill = 3
					traits = { 
					    career_officer
					}
					id = 1581
				}	
			}
			IBR = { 
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "Manuel Gutiérrez-Mellado"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/SPR/Portrait_Iberia_Manuel_Gutierrez_Mellado.dds"
					traits = { }
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 5
					defense_skill = 4
					planning_skill = 1
					logistics_skill = 3
					id = 1582
				}
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "Guillermo Quintana Lacaci"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/SPR/Portrait_SPR_Guillermo_Quintana_Lacaci.dds"
					traits = { }
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 5
					defense_skill = 4
					planning_skill = 1
					logistics_skill = 3
					id = 1583
				}
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "Álvaro Lacalle Leloup"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/SPR/Portrait_SPR_Alvaro_Lacalle_Leloup.dds"
					traits = { }
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 5
					defense_skill = 4
					planning_skill = 1
					logistics_skill = 3
					id = 1584
				}
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "José Rodrigo Rodrigo"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/SPR/Portrait_SPR_Jose_Rodrigo_Rodrigo.dds"
					traits = { }
					skill = 3
					attack_skill = 5
					defense_skill = 4
					planning_skill = 1
					logistics_skill = 3
					id = 1585
				}
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "Otelo Saraiva de Carvalho"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RPP/Portrait_RPP_Otelo_Saraiva_de_Carvalho_general.dds"
					traits = { }
					skill = 2
					attack_skill = 2
					defense_skill = 1
					planning_skill = 2
					logistics_skill = 2
					id = 1586
				}	
				create_corps_commander = { 
					name = "Fernando Salgueiro Maia"
					portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RPP/Salgueiro_Maia.dds"
					traits = { }
					skill = 2
					attack_skill = 2
					defense_skill = 2
					planning_skill = 2
					logistics_skill = 1
					id = 1587
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.820.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# No Pasaran!
		SPA = {
			#set_cosmetic_tag = SPA_MILITARYCOUP
			set_cosmetic_tag = IBR_MILITARYCOUP
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Alfonso Armada"
				desc = "POLITICS_ALFONSO_ARMADA_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Afonso_Armada.dds"
				expire = "1981.10.20"
				ideology = fascism_corporatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			SPA = {
				transfer_state = 998
				transfer_state = 181
				transfer_state = 997
				transfer_state = 180
				transfer_state = 171
				transfer_state = 174
				transfer_state = 995
				transfer_state = 172
				transfer_state = 996
				transfer_state = 170
				transfer_state = 1001
				transfer_state = 41
				transfer_state = 176
				transfer_state = 999
				transfer_state = 175
				transfer_state = 994
				every_owned_state = {
					add_core_of = SPA
				}
				add_popularity = { 
					ideology = fascism 
					popularity = 0.3
				}
				inherit_technology = IBR
				load_oob = SPA_MilitaryCoup
			}
		}
		SPA = {
			declare_war_on = {		
				target = IBR
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 0
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.1501
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
		set_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.820.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Arriba Iberia!
		SPA = {
			#set_cosmetic_tag = SPA_MILITARYCOUP
			set_cosmetic_tag = IBR_MILITARYCOUP
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Alfonso Armada"
				desc = "POLITICS_ALFONSO_ARMADA_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Afonso_Armada.dds"
				expire = "1981.10.20"
				ideology = fascism_corporatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
			change_tag_from = IBR
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			SPA = {
				transfer_state = 998
				transfer_state = 181
				transfer_state = 997
				transfer_state = 180
				transfer_state = 171
				transfer_state = 174
				transfer_state = 995
				transfer_state = 172
				transfer_state = 996
				transfer_state = 170
				transfer_state = 1001
				transfer_state = 41
				transfer_state = 176
				transfer_state = 999
				transfer_state = 175
				transfer_state = 994
				every_owned_state = {
					add_core_of = SPA
				}
				set_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
				add_popularity = { 
					ideology = fascism 
					popularity = 0.3
				}
				inherit_technology = IBR
				load_oob = SPA_MilitaryCoup
			}
		}
		SPA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = IBR
				type = civil_war
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 0
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.1501
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
		set_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.822
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.822"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.822.t
	desc = IBR.822.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.822.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			delete_unit_template_and_units = {
				division_template = "Brigada de Reserva"
			}
			IBR = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = IBR_MILITARYCOUP
			}
			IBR = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = fascism
					elections_allowed = no
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				annex_country = {
					target = SPA
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
			IBR = {
				change_tag_from = SPA
			}
			IBR = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = fascism
					long_name = IBR_fascism_coup_long
					name = IBR_fascism_coup
				}
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Alfonso Armada"
					desc = "POLITICS_ALFONSO_ARMADA_DESC"
					picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Afonso_Armada.dds"
					expire = "1981.10.20"
					ideology = fascism_corporatism_subtype
					traits = {
						# 
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = TNO_closing_screen_show
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_iberia_closing_screen_tt
		IBR = {
			add_popularity = { 
				ideology = fascism 
				popularity = 0.2
			}
			add_popularity = { 
				ideology = despotism 
				popularity = -0.2
			}
			add_popularity = { 
				ideology = authoritarian_democracy
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
	}
}

####Load the Death of Franco tree #
###################################
###################################

country_event = { #Death of Franco Union Edition���
	id = IBR.623
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.623"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_franco_dead
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = IBR_franco_ded
		}
	}
	title = IBR.623.t
	desc = IBR.623.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		has_country_leader = {
			character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
			ruling_only = yes
		}
		date > 1974.6.5
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.623.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion }
		
		add_stability = -0.075
		add_political_power = -100
		kill_country_leader = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Alejandro Rodríguez de Valcárcel"
			#desc = "POLITICS_ALEJANDRO_DE_VALCARCEL_DESC"
			picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Alejandro_Rodriguez_de_Valcarcel.dds"
			expire = "1975.10.20"
			ideology = despotism_subtype
			traits = {
				# 
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			SPA = {
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Alejandro Rodríguez de Valcárcel"
					#desc = "POLITICS_ALEJANDRO_DE_VALCARCEL_DESC"
					picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Alejandro_Rodriguez_de_Valcarcel.dds"
					expire = "1975.10.20"
					ideology = despotism_subtype
					traits = {
						# 
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
				NOT =  { has_global_flag = Iberian_Wars }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.1022
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_1
							has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_2
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_1
							has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_3
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_2
							has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_3
						}
					}
				}
				NOT =  { has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.1022
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemUnion
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_auth_union_finished_tree
				}
				NOT =  { has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.1022
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemUnion
				NOT =  { has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_authunion_goodending
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.1110
				days = 7
			}
			
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion
				NOT =  { has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_despotistunion_goodending
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.1110
				days = 7
			}
			
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.623.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = {  has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }
		
		add_political_power = -75
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_auth_congress_finished_tree }
			
			clr_country_flag = IBR_auth_congress_finished_tree
			
			hidden_effect = {
				kill_country_leader = yes
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "António de Spínola"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTONIO_SPINOLA_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Antonio_Spinola.dds"
				expire = "1975.10.20"
				ideology = authoritarian_democracy_national_conservatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					news_event = {
						id = WORLD.1504
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis
			set_country_flag = TNO_closing_screen_show
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_iberia_closing_screen_tt
		}
		else = {
		
			kill_country_leader = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Alejandro Rodríguez de Valcárcel"
				#desc = "POLITICS_ALEJANDRO_DE_VALCARCEL_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Alejandro_Rodriguez_de_Valcarcel.dds"
				expire = "1975.10.20"
				ideology = authoritarian_democracy_national_conservatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.1022
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #New Ways of Tackling Terrorism?
	id = IBR.5060
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5060"}

	desc = IBR.5060.d
