		if = {
			limit = { 
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = soccon_completed_cultural_diversity
					has_country_flag = soccon_completed_token_autonomy
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -50
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_CNT_Support = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_ETA_Support = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_TBA_Support = 1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_FSLP_Support = 1
			}
			IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_small_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_small_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_small_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_small_tt
			
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = soccon_completed_cultural_diversity
					has_country_flag = soccon_completed_token_autonomy
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -100
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_CNT_Support = 2
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_ETA_Support = 2
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_TBA_Support = 2
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_FSLP_Support = 2
			}
			IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_mid_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_mid_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_mid_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_mid_tt
		}
		else = {

			add_political_power = -150
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = -1
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_CNT_Support = 3
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_ETA_Support = 3
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_TBA_Support = 3
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				IBR_FSLP_Support = 3
			}
			IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_big_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_big_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_big_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_big_tt
		}
	}
	option = { #Liquidate them in prison
		name = IBR.5060.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5061
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Hire hitmen to get rid of them
		name = IBR.5060.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5066
				days = 3
			}
		}	
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.648.t
	desc = IBR.648.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.648.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR_sub_5_authdem = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_pop_militancy_natu
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_check_militancy_natu_events = yes #for the 2 events
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_pop_militancy_small_tt
	}

	id = IBR.673
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.673"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_guy_paper_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.673.t
	desc = IBR.673.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.673.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { econ_centralization_temp = -6 }
		econ_centralization_change = yes
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = -1 } #already converted to percent
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		TNO_worsen_poverty_med = yes
		
		country_event = {
			id = IBR.674
			days = 3
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.673.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { econ_centralization_temp = 6 }
		econ_centralization_change = yes
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = -1 } 
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		TNO_worsen_poverty_med = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_pop_militancy_natu
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_check_militancy_natu_events = yes #for the 2 events
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_pop_militancy_small_tt
	}

	id = IBR.680
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.680"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_valcarcel
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.680.t
	desc = IBR.680.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.680.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		country_event = {
			id = IBR.683
			days = 3
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_pop_militancy_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_pop_militancy_natu
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_check_militancy_natu_events = yes #for the 2 events
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.682
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.682"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_fraga
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.682.t
	desc = IBR.682.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.682.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBR_salvation_coalition_happened
		set_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis
		clr_country_flag = IBRElectionsYES
		set_country_flag = elections_delayed
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = conservative_democracy
			long_name = IBR_conservative_democracy_salvation_long
			name = IBR_conservative_democracy_salvation
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = liberal_democracy
			long_name = IBR_liberal_democracy_salvation_long
			name = IBR_liberal_democracy_salvation
		} 
		hidden_effect = { 
		every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.475
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = conservative_democracy
			last_election = "1970.6.6"
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = IBR_Diogo_Freitas_dep
		add_ideas = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez_mil
		add_ideas = IBR_Pio_Cabanillas_for
		add_ideas = IBR_Juan_Garcia_eco	
		IBR_sub_15_authdem = yes
		IBR_add_15_soccon = yes
		IBR_add_15_soclib = yes
		IBR_add_10_marklib = yes
		IBR_add_5_socdem = yes
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_politics_salvation_democratic
			keep_completed = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.700
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.700"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes_building
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.700.t
	desc = IBR.700.d
	trigger = {
	    tag = IBR
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.700.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_the_iberian_congress
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.3175
				days = 20
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.3185
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.704
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.704"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.704.t
	desc = IBR.704.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		has_global_flag = german_civil_war
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.704.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		set_country_flag = IBR_started_germany_in_flames
		load_focus_tree = {
			tree = IBR_germany_in_flames_tree
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = Iberia_Wakes_Up }}
			
			hidden_effect = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.55
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.706
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.706"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_guy_paper_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.706.t
	desc = IBR.706.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.706.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.707
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.707"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_whitehouse_color
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.707.t
	desc = IBR.707.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.707.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBRChoseUnion}
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
    					has_country_leader = {
        				character = IBR_Torcuato_Fernandez_Miranda
						ruling_only = yes
    					} 
						has_country_leader = {
        				character = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez
        				ruling_only = yes
    					}
					}
				}
				
				IBR_add_10_soclib = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 			
					has_country_leader = {
                        character = IBR_Alberto_Ullastres_Calvo
                        ruling_only = yes
					   } 
					}
				
				IBR_add_10_marklib = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_government = conservative_democracy }
				
				IBR_add_10_soccon = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_government = authoritarian_democracy }
				
				IBR_add_10_authdem = yes
			}
		}
		
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
				value = -6
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_auth_big_tt
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				USA = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
			}
			
			USA = { add_to_faction = IBR}
			add_to_array = {
				global.OFN_members = var:OFN_candidate
			}
			add_ideas = OFN_Independent_Member	
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.710
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.710"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_guy_paper_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.710.t
	desc = IBR.710.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.710.a
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRDemUnion }
		}
		set_variable = { OFN_candidate = IBR.id }
		USA_OFN_start_vote_on_candidate = yes 
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.710.b
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no 
			IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRDemUnion }
		}
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.711
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.710.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		trigger = { is_ai = yes }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRDemUnion }
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.707
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.711
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.710.e
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			IBR = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBRDemUnion } }
		}
		
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.711
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.711
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.711"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_whitehouse_color
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.711.t
	desc = IBR.711.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.711.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_ideas = OFN_Observer
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = USA
			relation = guarantee
			active = yes
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = USA
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = USA
			relation = military_access
			active = yes
		}
		USA = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = IBR
				relation = guarantee
				active = yes
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = IBR
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = IBR
				relation = military_access
				active = yes
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
				value = -3
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_auth_med_tt
		}
	}
}

	desc = IBR.5200.d
	option = { #The Guardia Civil will put an end to this
		name = IBR.5200.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = death_strong_franco}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5201
				days = 2
			}
		}
		}
		else = {
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5202
				days = 3
			}
		}
		}
	}
	option = { #More men are needed, but so is restraint!
		name = IBR.5200.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

		limit = { has_country_flag = death_strong_franco}

		}

				days = 1
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3129
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

			value = 1

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_push_iberia
	}
	option = { #Push it in minority regions
		name = IBR.5081.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -10
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Support
			value = -1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Support
			value = -1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Support
			value = -1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Support
			value = -1
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_cnt_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_eta_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_fslp_support_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_tba_support_small_tt

	}

country_event = { #The Method
	id = IBR.5087
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5087"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_military_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5087.t
	desc = IBR.5087.d
	option = { #With a Velvet Glove
		name = IBR.5087.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_push_iberia
				has_country_flag = IBR_target_politicians
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5089
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5092
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #In the Shadows
		name = IBR.5087.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = { #terrorists
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_infiltrate_terrorists
				has_country_flag = IBR_target_terrorists
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5090
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
		else_if = { #intellectuals
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_infiltrate_universities
				has_country_flag = IBR_target_intellectuals
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5091
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5093
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Openly, with Great Force
		name = IBR.5087.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_push_minority_regions
				has_country_flag = IBR_target_terrorists
			}
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5088
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5094
				days = 13
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5104
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.5103.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5105
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

#The final debate (focus)

country_event = { #A Momentous Day in Iberian History
	id = IBR.5114
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5114"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes_building
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5114.t
	desc = IBR.5114.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5114.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5117
						days = 1
					}				
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5118
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5115
						days = 1
					}
					set_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_lib
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5116
						days = 1
					}
					set_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_con
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Civil Liberty Reforms Pushed
	id = IBR.5115
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5115"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_congress_clapping
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5115.t
	desc = IBR.5115.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5115.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 4}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_councildebate_1
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_congress_broadcast }
			
			add_stability = 0.075
		
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1.5
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
			
			IBR_add_15_marklib = yes
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_broadcast_pos_tt
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
			
			IBR_add_10_marklib = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5127
				hours = 1
			}	
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #FINAL DEBATE OVER - no bad combos - LIB VICTORY
	id = IBR.5123
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5123"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_congress_clapping
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5123.t
	desc = IBR.5123.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5123.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_councildebate_9
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_congress_broadcast }
			
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 15}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
			add_political_power = 150
			
			IBR_add_20_marklib = yes
			IBR_add_20_soclib = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 6
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_broadcast_pos_tt
		}
		else = {
			
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 10}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
			add_political_power = 100
			
			IBR_add_15_marklib = yes
			IBR_add_15_soclib = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 4
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
		}
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_congress_debate_over
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_broadcast
	}
}

country_event = { #FINAL DEBATE OVER - no bad combos - CON VICTORY
	id = IBR.5124
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5124"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5124.t
	desc = IBR.5124.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5124.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_councildebate_10
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_congress_broadcast }
			
			add_political_power = 75
			
			IBR_add_15_soccon = yes
			IBR_sub_15_authdem = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 4.5
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_broadcast_pos_tt
		}
		else = {
			
			add_political_power = 50
			
			IBR_add_10_soccon = yes
			IBR_sub_10_authdem = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 3
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
		}
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_congress_debate_over
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_broadcast
	}
}

country_event = { #WHICH REGIONAL DEBATE EVENT
	id = IBR.5127
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5127"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.5127.t
	desc = IBR.5127.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5127.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5121
						days = 1
					}				
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5122
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
					}
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5119
						days = 1
					}
					set_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_lib
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5120
						days = 1
					}
					set_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_con
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #WHICH ENDING EVENT
	id = IBR.5128
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5128"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.5128.t
	desc = IBR.5128.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5128.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			if = { #LIB ENDING
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_lib
					has_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_lib
				}
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5123
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { #CON ENDING
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_con
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_con
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_lib
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_con
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_con
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_lib
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5124
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { #BAD ENDING
				limit = { 
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 2
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
							has_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5126
					days = 1
				}
			}
			else = { #MIXED
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5125
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		#CLEARIN ALL OF THEM FLAGS EXCEPT THE BROADCAST ONE#
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_technocrats
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_separatists
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_militarists
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_conservatives
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_lib
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_liberty_con
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_lib
		clr_country_flag = IBR_congress_regions_con
	}
}

	id = IBR.5131
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5131"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5131.t
	desc = IBR.5131.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5131.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_auth_small_tt
		
		tno_trade_laws_improve = yes
		
		IBR_sub_5_authdem = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_politics
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities
				check_variable = {
					IBR_ac_authoritarianism > 2
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5163
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_politics
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities
				check_variable = {
					IBR_ac_authoritarianism < -2
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5159
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {

				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities
			}

					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_economics

				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_politics

			clr_country_flag = IBR_ac_restructuring_unfair
			clr_country_flag = IBR_ac_what_they_want
			clr_country_flag = IBR_ac_multiparty_system
			
			clr_country_flag = IBR_auth_congress_authoritarianism
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.5131.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = tno_trade_laws_limited_exports }
			
			tno_trade_laws_worsen = yes
		}
		else = {
			TNO_improve_trade_laws_policy_effectiveness_low = yes
		}

				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities

				}

					days = 3
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_politics
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities
				check_variable = {
					IBR_ac_authoritarianism < -2
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5159
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {

				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_politics
				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities
			}

					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {

				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_fp_minorities

	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_big_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.5138.t
	desc = IBR.5138.d
	option = { #A thorough overhaul is in order
		name = IBR.5138.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = -6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_auth_big_tt
		add_ideas = tno_vote_franchise_registered_voting
	}
	option = { #Let us focus on the tabled reforms
		name = IBR.5138.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = -3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_auth_med_tt
		
	}

				has_country_flag = IBR_ac_social_window_weak

			}
		}

			}

				days = 5
			}
		}
		
	}

	id = IBR.5162
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5162"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_army_joins_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no

	desc = IBR.5162.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.5162.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = 100
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = liberal_democracy
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				desc = "POLITICS_MANUEL_MELLADO_DESC"
				expire = "1981.10.20"
				ideology = liberal_democracy_subtype
				traits = {
					#
				}
			}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = IBR_Adelino_Palma_dep
		add_ideas = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez_mil
		add_ideas = IBR_Joaquin_Gimenez_for
		add_ideas = IBR_Licinio_Fuente_eco
		set_cosmetic_tag = IBR_CONGRESS
		clr_country_flag = IBR_auth_congress_authoritarianism
		load_focus_tree = { 
			tree = IBR_politics_carnation_revolution
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.1503
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Iberia Proposes a Non-agression Pact
	id = IBR.722
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.722"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_meeting_table
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.722.t
	desc = IBR.722.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.722.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = IBR
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		IBR = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.729
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.722.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_political_power = 25
		
		IBR = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.736
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.722.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = yes }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = { 
					character = GER_martin_bormann
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			
			random_list = {
				60 = { 
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = IBR
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = yes
					}
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.729
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.736
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = IBR
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
			IBR = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.729
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #German-Iberian Non-Agression Pact
	id = IBR.729
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.729"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_big_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.729.t
	desc = IBR.729.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.729.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion}
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				GER = { has_government = national_socialism } 
				has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
				value = 6
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_auth_big_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				GER = { has_government = fascism } 
				has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
				value = 3
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_auth_med_tt
		}
	}
}

	desc = IBR.780.d

		name = IBR.780.a

			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}

			limit = { tag = ENG }
		
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.781
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
		
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.782
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #No Way
		name = IBR.780.b
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		set_country_flag = IBR_refused_pact #IDK what this is for tbqh
		
		if = {
			limit = { tag = ENG }
		
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.783
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
		
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.784
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #NONAG ITALY
	id = IBR.734
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.734"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.734.t
	desc = IBR.734.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.734.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = IBR
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.867
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.734.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_political_power = 20
		
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.734.c
		trigger = { is_ai = yes }
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = ITA_Carlo_Scorza
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				ILG = {
					has_country_leader = {
						character = ILG_messali_hadj
						ruling_only = yes
					}	
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRChoseUnion }}
				random_list = {
					90 = { 
						diplomatic_relation = {
							country = IBR
							relation = non_aggression_pact
							active = yes
						}
						IBR = {
							country_event = { 
								id = IBR.867
								days = 6
							}
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						IBR = {
							country_event = { 
								id = IBR.868
								days = 6
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }}
				random_list = {
					60 = { 
						diplomatic_relation = {
							country = IBR
							relation = non_aggression_pact
							active = yes
						}
						IBR = {
							country_event = { 
								id = IBR.867
								days = 6
							}
						}
					}
					40 = { 
						IBR = {
							country_event = { 
								id = IBR.868
								days = 6
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = ITA_Carlo_Scorza
					ruling_only = yes
				}		
			}
			
			IBR = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.868
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion }}
 
				IBR = {
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.868
						days = 6
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = IBR
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = yes
				}
				IBR = {
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.867
						days = 6
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
}

country_event = { #TURKEY NONAG
	id = IBR.735
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.735"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.735.t
	desc = IBR.735.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.735.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = IBR
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.735.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 20
		
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.735.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = yes }
		
		if = {
			limit = { IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRChoseUnion }}
			random_list = {
				90 = { 
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = IBR
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = yes
					}
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.869
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.870
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { IBR = { has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }}
			random_list = {
				75 = { 
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = IBR
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = yes
					}
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.869
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
				25 = { 
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.870
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_list = {
				50 = { 
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = IBR
						relation = non_aggression_pact
						active = yes
					}
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.869
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					IBR = {
						country_event = { 
							id = IBR.870
							days = 6
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Italo-Iberian Non-Agression Pact
	id = IBR.867
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.867"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_big_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.867.t
	desc = IBR.867.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.867.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBRChoseUnion}
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 0.5
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {  
				OR = { 
						has_country_leader = {
							character = IBR_Torcuato_Fernandez_Miranda
							ruling_only = yes
						} 
						has_country_leader = {
							character = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				
				IBR_add_5_soclib = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 			
					has_country_leader = {
                        character = IBR_Alberto_Ullastres_Calvo
                        ruling_only = yes
					   } 
					}
				
				IBR_add_5_marklib = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_government = conservative_democracy }
				
				IBR_add_5_soccon = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_government = authoritarian_democracy }
				
				IBR_add_5_authdem = yes
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				ITA = { has_government = fascism } 
				has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
				value = 3
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_auth_med_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						ITA = { has_government = fascism }
						ITA = { has_government = despotism }
						ITA = { has_government = authoritarian_democracy } 
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
			}
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
				value = -3
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_auth_med_tt
		}
	}
}

					}

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_fslp_support_small_tt

country_event = { #Mass Arrests Begin
	id = IBR.5302
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5302"}
	title = IBR.5302.t
	desc = IBR.5302.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_basques_arrested
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5302.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit =  { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_treason_law
				has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_exile_colonies
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5303
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_exile_colonies }
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5305
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5308
					days = 20
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			var = IBR_CNT_Activity
			value = -1.5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Activity
			value = -1.5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Activity
			value = -1.5
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_FSLP_Activity
			value = -1.5
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_cnt_activity_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_eta_activity_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_fslp_activity_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_tba_activity_small_tt
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_1

			limit =  { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_caudillos_know_best
			}

					id = IBR.5304
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = IBR_despotist_tarrafal_good

	}

			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_media_2
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_media_4
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5331
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
		
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5332
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = IBR.5351.t
	desc = IBR.5351.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_franco_speech
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5351.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_tarrafal_good
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5352
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_tarrafal_bad
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5353
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
		else = {

				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5354
					days = 4
				}

country_event = { #The End of Self Rule
	id = IBR.5362
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5362"}
	title = IBR.5362.t
	desc = IBR.5362.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_cortes_building
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.5362.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit =  { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_good_ending_2
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_fresh_faces
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_numbers_reasonable
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5365
						days = 6
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_trusted_collaborators
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_great_numbers
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5367
						days = 6
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_trusted_collaborators
					has_country_flag = IBR_despotist_numbers_reasonable
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5368
						days = 6
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
			
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.5372
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5363
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = IBR.5374.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_really_big_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_CNT_Support
			value = 4
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ETA_Support
			value = 4
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_TBA_Support
			value = 4
		}
		IBR_terror_vunerable_check = yes

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_cnt_support_big_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_eta_support_big_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_tba_support_big_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5376
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5375
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#SOCLIB OIL CRISIS

country_event = { #The Beggining of Rationing
	id = IBR.5400
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5400"}
	title = IBR.5400.t
	desc = IBR.5400.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_oil_crisis
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Strict rationing is required
		name = IBR.5400.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_ideas = IBR_OC_oil_ration_idea
		hidden_effect = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {modifier = IBR_OC_oil_ration_dyn_mod}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_OC_oil_ration_var = 0.05}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_OC_oil_ration_stab_var = -0.03}
		}
		
		IBR_sub_10_soclib = yes
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_right_1
	}
	option = { #Only ration what is absolutely necessary
		name = IBR.5400.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_ideas = IBR_OC_oil_ration_idea
		hidden_effect = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {modifier = IBR_OC_oil_ration_dyn_mod}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_OC_oil_ration_var = 0.03}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_OC_oil_ration_stab_var = -0.015}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Question of Interest Rates
	id = IBR.5401
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5401"}
	title = IBR.5401.t
	desc = IBR.5401.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_sign_treaty3
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Up the numbers substantially
		name = IBR.5401.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		IBR_sub_5_soclib = yes
		
		set_temp_variable = { interest_rates_temp = 1.5 } #already converted to percentage
		econ_interest_rates_change = yes
		
		set_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_right_2
	}
	option = { #A slight increase is enough
		name = IBR.5401.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { interest_rates_temp = 0.5 } #already converted to percentage
		econ_interest_rates_change = yes
	}
}

		set_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_right_3

	option = { #That is... acceptable
		name = IBR.5414.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { interest_rates_temp = -0.25 } #already converted to percentage
		econ_interest_rates_change = yes
	}
}

#bad ending
country_event = { #A Slow Recovery from the Crisis
	id = IBR.5427
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5427"}
	title = IBR.5427.t
	desc = IBR.5427.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_oil_crisis
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	immediate = { clr_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis }
	
	option = { #soclib option
		name = IBR.5427.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Torcuato_Fernandez_Miranda
					ruling_only = yes
				} 
				has_country_leader = {
					character = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			} 
		}
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 1
		}
		IBR_check_military_hostility_events = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_milhost_small_tt
		
		IBR_sub_20_soclib = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5430
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #marlib option
		name = IBR.5427.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { 			
			has_country_leader = {
                        character = IBR_Alberto_Ullastres_Calvo
                        ruling_only = yes
					   } 
					}
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		IBR_sub_20_marklib = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5430
				days = 180
			}
		}		
	}
	option = { #soccon option
		name = IBR.5427.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_government = conservative_democracy }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
		social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		
		admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
		admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		IBR_sub_20_soccon = yes 
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5430
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #nat union option
		name = IBR.5427.e
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = IBRNationalUnionVictory }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_pop_militancy_natu
			value = 3
		}
		IBR_check_militancy_natu_events = yes #for the 2 events
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_pop_militancy_big_tt
		
		IBR_sub_20_authdem = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5430
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #auth congress option1
		name = IBR.5427.f
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
			check_variable = {
				IBR_ac_authoritarianism > 0
			}
		}
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_AC_bigausterity } }
			
			social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
			
			admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		}
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = 6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_auth_big_tt
		
		IBR_sub_20_authdem = yes
		#auth congress gets this one if they're authoritarian to push them further up
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5430
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #auth congress option2
		name = IBR.5427.g
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
			check_variable = {
				IBR_ac_authoritarianism < 0
			}
		}
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_AC_bigausterity } }
			
			social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
			
			admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		}
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = -6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_auth_big_tt
		
		IBR_sub_20_authdem = yes
		#auth congress gets this one if they're not authoritarian to push them further down
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5430
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #auth union option
		name = IBR.5427.h
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemUnion }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
		
		IBR_sub_20_authdem = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5422
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5431
					days = 250
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #despotist union option
		name = IBR.5427.i
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.075
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_really_big_tt
		
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = despotism
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5426
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5431
					days = 250
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_big_tt
		
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.075
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.5 } #already converted to percent
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_pop_militancy_natu
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_pop_militancy_big_tt
		
		IBR_add_15_authdem = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5429
				days = 120
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #auth congress option1
		name = IBR.5428.f
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = {  has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_big_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_AC_bigausterity } }
			
			social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
			
			admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		}
		
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.075
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.5 } #already converted to percent
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_auth_big_tt
		
		IBR_add_15_authdem = yes
		
	}
	option = { #auth congress option2
		name = IBR.5428.g
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = {  has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_big_tt
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_AC_bigausterity } }
			
			social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
			
			admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
			admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		}

		add_stability = 0.075

		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_ac_authoritarianism
			value = -5
		}

		IBR_add_15_authdem = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.5429
				days = 120
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #auth union option
		name = IBR.5428.h
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemUnion }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.075
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.3 } #already converted to percent
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 4
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_really_big_tt
		
		IBR_add_15_authdem = yes
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5422
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5430
					days = 180
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #despotist union option
		name = IBR.5428.i
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = IBRDespotistUnion }
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt

		add_stability = 0.075
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.4 } #already converted to percent 
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes

			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 3
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt

			ideology = despotism
			popularity = 0.075
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIberiaStability < 1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5426
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5430
					days = 180
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Good ending check
	id = IBR.5429
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5429"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_oil_crisis
	title = IBR.5429.t
	desc = IBR.5429.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no

	option = {
		name = IBR.5429.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { OC_dynamic_modifier_counter = 4 }
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over
		}
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		if = { # Once it hits five, remove the dynamic effect and clear the variables
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over }
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5429
					days = 120
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			clr_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over
			
			if = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_AC_bigausterity
					has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
				}
				
				social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
				social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
				
				admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
				admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = IBR_OC_oil_ration_idea
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {modifier = IBR_OC_oil_ration_dyn_mod}
				clear_variable = IBR_OC_oil_ration_var
				clear_variable = IBR_OC_oil_ration_stab_var
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Middle ending check
	id = IBR.5430
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5430"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_oil_crisis
	title = IBR.5430.t
	desc = IBR.5430.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no

	option = {
		name = IBR.5430.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { OC_dynamic_modifier_counter = 4 }
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over
		}
		
		TNO_Oil_Crisis_reduce_effects = yes
		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt
		
		if = { # Once it hits five, remove the dynamic effect and clear the variables
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over }
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5430
					days = 180
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			clr_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over
			
			if = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_AC_bigausterity
					has_country_flag = IBRAuthDemCongress
				}
				
				social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
				social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
				
				admin_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
				admin_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = IBR_OC_oil_ration_idea
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {modifier = IBR_OC_oil_ration_dyn_mod}
				clear_variable = IBR_OC_oil_ration_var
				clear_variable = IBR_OC_oil_ration_stab_var
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = IBR.5431.t

	hidden = no

		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

			limit = {
				check_variable = { OC_dynamic_modifier_counter = 4 }
			}
			set_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over
		}

		IBR_Oil_Crisis_Clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_oil_crisis_remove_small_tt

			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over }
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.5431
					days = 250
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			clr_country_flag = IBR_oilcrisis_idea_over

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Government Auction
	id = IBR.5001
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5001"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_sign_treaty1
	title = IBR.5001.t
	desc = IBR.5001.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	fire_only_once = yes 
	hidden = no 
	
	option = {
		name = IBR.5001.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.5002
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
				60 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.5003
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
				20 = {
					IBR = {
						country_event = {
							id = IBR.5004
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}			
			}
		}
    }
}

country_event = { #Government Auction Disaster
	id = IBR.5002
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5002"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_looking_out_window
	title = IBR.5002.t
	desc = IBR.5002.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	fire_only_once = yes 
	hidden = no 
	
	option = {
		name = IBR.5002.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR = {
			add_political_power = -150
			
			set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.1 } 
			econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
			
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_GDP_boost_percentage = 0.005 }
			econ_GDP_boost_once_percentage = yes
			
		    IBR_sub_15_marklib = yes
		    add_to_variable = {
		    	var = IBRIberiaStability
		    	value = -2
		    }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
			TNO_worsen_poverty_med = yes
			set_temp_variable = { econ_centralization_temp = -6 }
			econ_centralization_change = yes
		}		
	} 
}

		name = IBR.5003.a

		IBR = {
		    set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.35 } 
			econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
			
			set_temp_variable = { econ_centralization_temp = -6 }
			econ_centralization_change = yes
			
			set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_GDP_boost_percentage = 0.01 }
			econ_GDP_boost_once_percentage = yes
			
		    add_political_power = 50
		}
	}
}

	id = IBR.5008
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.5008"}

	desc = IBR.5008.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes 
	fire_only_once = yes 
	hidden = no 
	
	option = { #Fully committed to marlib
		name = IBR.5008.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 50
		hidden_effect = {
		    if = {
		    	limit = {
		    		has_country_flag = marlib_liberal_posture
		    	}
		        country_event = {
		    	    id = IBR.5011
		    	    days = 5
		    	}		
		    }
		    else = {
		        country_event = {
		    		id = IBR.5009
		    		days = 5
		    	}		
		    }
		}
	}
	option = { #Reassure skeptics
		name = IBR.5008.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = -50
			
		set_temp_variable = { interest_rates_temp = 1 } #already converted to percentage
		econ_interest_rates_change = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
		    if = {
		    	limit = {
		    		has_country_flag = marlib_liberal_posture
		    	}
		    	
		        country_event = {
		    		id = IBR.5012
		    		days = 5
		    	}		
		    }
		    else = {
		        country_event = {
		    		id = IBR.5010
		    		days = 5
		    	}
		    }
		}
	}
}

					days = 5
				}	
		    }
		}

		set_country_flag = marlib_opus_dei_epic
	} 
}

		add_popularity = {
		    ideology = liberal_democracy
		    popularity = 0.1	
	    }
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_marlib_positive_change
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 1 }

			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt

country_event = {	#A Concerning Report
	id = IBR.980
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.980"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.980.t
	desc = IBR.980.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.980.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Probably a fake, but investigate it.
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.981
					days = 7
				}
			}
			70 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.983
					days = 7
				}
			}
			20 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.982
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.980.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Increase security around our Deputies.
		random_list = {
			20 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.981
					days = 7
				}
			}
			30 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.983
					days = 7
				}
			}
			50 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.982
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.980.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Perhaps those officers can get a surprise re-assignment...
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.981 
					days = 7
				}
				subtract_from_variable = {
					var = IBRMilitaryHostility
					value = 3
				}
			}
			40 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.983
					days = 7
				}
			}
			20 = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.982
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.984
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.984"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.984.t
	desc = IBR.984.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.984.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# To Arms!
		if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRMilitaryHostility
					}
					has_country_flag = IBR_socdem_curtailed_military
					has_country_flag = IBR_socdem_crackdown
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				5 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.985
						days = 7
					}
				}
				70 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.986
						days = 7
					}
				}
				25 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.987
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRMilitaryHostility
					}
					has_country_flag = IBR_socdem_curtailed_military
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.985
						days = 7
					}
				}
				75 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.986
						days = 7
					}
				}
				15 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.987
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRMilitaryHostility
					}
					has_country_flag = IBR_socdem_crackdown
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.985
						days = 7
					}
				}
				60 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.986
						days = 7
					}
				}
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.987
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					IBRIzquierdaPopularity > IBRMilitaryHostility
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.985 
						days = 7 
					}
				}
				50 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.986 
						days = 7 
					}
				}
				30 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.987 
						days = 7 
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_list = {
				40 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.985
						days = 7
					}
				}
				30 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.986
						days = 7
					}
				}
				30 = {
					country_event = {
						id = IBR.987
						days = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.987
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.987"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.987.t
	desc = IBR.987.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.987.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# No Pasaran!
		SPA = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = SPA_MILITARYCOUP
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Alfonso Armada"
				desc = "POLITICS_ALFONSO_ARMADA_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Afonso_Armada.dds"
				expire = "1981.10.20"
				ideology = fascism_corporatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 998
			transfer_state = 181
			transfer_state = 997
			transfer_state = 180
			transfer_state = 171
			transfer_state = 174
			transfer_state = 995
			transfer_state = 172
			transfer_state = 996
			transfer_state = 170
			transfer_state = 1001
			transfer_state = 41
			transfer_state = 176
			transfer_state = 999
			transfer_state = 175
			transfer_state = 994
			every_controlled_state = {
				add_core_of = SPA
			}
			set_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
			inherit_technology = IBR
			load_oob = SPA_MilitaryCoup
			declare_war_on = {
				target = IBR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.987.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Arriba Iberia!
		SPA = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = SPA_MILITARYCOUP
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = fascism
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Alfonso Armada"
				desc = "POLITICS_ALFONSO_ARMADA_DESC"
				picture = "Portrait_Iberia_Afonso_Armada.dds"
				expire = "1981.10.20"
				ideology = fascism_corporatism_subtype
				traits = {
					# 
				}
			}
			transfer_state = 998
			transfer_state = 181
			transfer_state = 997
			transfer_state = 180
			transfer_state = 171
			transfer_state = 174
			transfer_state = 995
			transfer_state = 172
			transfer_state = 996
			transfer_state = 170
			transfer_state = 1001
			transfer_state = 41
			transfer_state = 176
			transfer_state = 999
			transfer_state = 175
			transfer_state = 994
			every_controlled_state = {
				add_core_of = SPA
			}
			inherit_technology = IBR
			change_tag_from = IBR
			set_country_flag = IberianCivilWar2
			load_oob = SPA_MilitaryCoup
			declare_war_on = {
				target = IBR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryHostility
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.989.t
	desc = IBR.989.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.989.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Put them on trial!
		country_event = {
			id = IBR.991
			days = 3
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Oil crisis trees trigger
	id = IBR.1001
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1001"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_oil_crisis
	is_triggered_only = yes #triggered from the oil crisis event
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1001.t
	desc = IBR.1001.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1001.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = The_Gibraltar_Dam_Completed }
			set_variable = { OC_fuel_gain_factor = -0.4 }
			set_variable = { OC_production_oil_factor = -0.5 }
			set_variable = { OC_political_power_factor = -0.15 }
			set_variable = { OC_stability_factor = -0.05 }
			set_variable = { OC_production_speed_buildings_factor = -0.15 }
			set_variable = { OC_consumer_goods_factor = 0.15 }
			set_variable = { OC_industrial_capacity_factory = -0.05 }
			set_variable = { OC_industrial_capacity_dockyard = -0.05 }
			set_variable = { OC_trade_opinion_factor = -0.5 }
			set_variable = { OC_annual_gdp_growth_factor = -0.10 }
			set_variable = { OC_proportional_pop_cost = 0.04 }
			set_variable = { OC_personnel_cost_modifier = 0.25 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_has_finished_dam_OC
		}
		set_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					has_country_leader = {
						character = IBR_Torcuato_Fernandez_Miranda
						ruling_only = yes
					} 
					has_country_leader = {
						character = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_left_lib_oil keep_completed = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
						has_country_leader = {
                        character = IBR_Alberto_Ullastres_Calvo
                        ruling_only = yes
                       }
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_market_lib_oil keep_completed = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = conservative_democracy
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_conservative_oil keep_completed = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_focus_tree = IBR_politics_national_union
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_national_union_oil keep_completed = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_focus_tree = IBR_politics_auth_congress
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_auth_congress_oil keep_completed = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_focus_tree = IBR_politics_despotist_union
			}
			load_focus_tree = { tree = IBR_politics_despotist_union_oil keep_completed = yes }
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.3208
				days = 11
			}
		}	
	}
}
country_event = { #The Gibraltar Dam Opening Ceremony (non dem iberia)
	id = IBR.1002
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1002"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_dam_iberia
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1002.t
	desc = IBR.1002.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1002.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 100 
		hidden_effect = { 
			remove_ideas = The_Gibraltar_Dam 
			add_ideas = The_Gibraltar_Dam_Completed
		}
		add_to_variable = {IBR_gdp_growth_dam_variable = 1.0}
		add_to_variable = {IBR_power_dam_variable = 436}
		add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 2
			}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.1005
			}
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.501
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.31480
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Gibraltar Dam Opening Ceremony (dem iberia)
	id = IBR.1003
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1003"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_dam_iberia
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1003.t
	desc = IBR.1003.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1003.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 100 
		remove_ideas = The_Gibraltar_Dam 
		add_ideas = The_Gibraltar_Dam_Completed
		add_to_variable = {IBR_gdp_growth_dam_variable = 1.0}
		add_to_variable = {IBR_power_dam_variable = 436}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = authoritarian_democracy }
			
			IBR_add_10_authdem = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = conservative_democracy }
			
			IBR_add_10_soccon = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 			
				has_country_leader = {
                    character = IBR_Alberto_Ullastres_Calvo
                    ruling_only = yes
				} 
			}
		
			IBR_add_10_marklib = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
					OR = { 
					has_country_leader = {
						character = IBR_Torcuato_Fernandez_Miranda
						ruling_only = yes
					} 
					has_country_leader = {
						character = IBR_Manuel_Gutierrez
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}

			IBR_add_10_soclib = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = WORLD.501
					days = 1
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.31480
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1005
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1005"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_dam_iberia
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.1005.t
	desc = IBR.1005.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1005.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_to_variable = {IBR_dam_cost = -5 }
		add_to_variable = {IBR_dam_cost_upgrades = -5 } 
		clamp_variable = {
			var = IBR_dam_cost_upgrades
			min = 0
			max = 2000
		}				
		set_temp_variable = {IBR_dam_cost_temp = 0 }
		add_to_temp_variable = {IBR_dam_cost_temp = IBR_dam_cost_maintenance }
		add_to_temp_variable = {IBR_dam_cost_temp = IBR_dam_cost_upgrades }
		add_to_temp_variable = {IBR_dam_cost_temp = IBR_dam_cost_workers }
		set_variable = {IBR_dam_cost = IBR_dam_cost_temp} 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = {IBR_dam_cost_upgrades > 0}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.1005 
				days = 40
			}
		}
	}
}

			days = 1
	    }
		}
	}

		name = IBR.6000.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {

			days = 1
	    }
