country_event = { #Meeting local leaders
	id = IBR.6001
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6001"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_morocco_hotel
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6001.t
	desc = IBR.6001.d
	option = { #north africans should have autonomy
		name = IBR.6001.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = red_carpet }
		
		set_country_flag = mor_autonomy
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_natives_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_settlers_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_native_alignment
			value = 4
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_settlers_alignment
			value = -4
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1.5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
			id = IBR.6002
			days = 1
			}
			}
		}
		else = {
		set_country_flag = mor_autonomy
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_natives_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_settlers_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_native_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_settlers_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
			id = IBR.6002
			days = 1
			}
			}
		}
		
		
		
	}
	option = { #this land is iberian 
		name = IBR.6001.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = red_carpet }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_natives_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_settlers_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_native_alignment
			value = -4
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_settlers_alignment
			value = 4
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -1.5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
			id = IBR.6002
			days = 1
			}
			}
		}
		else = {
		

		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_natives_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_settlers_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_native_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_settlers_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
			id = IBR.6002
			days = 1
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Meeting settlers
	id = IBR.6002
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6002"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_morocco_hotel
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6002.t
	desc = IBR.6002.d
	option = { #promise more funding
		name = IBR.6002.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = red_carpet }
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mor_autonomy }
				
				add_political_power = -50
				
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_settlers_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {
					var = IBR_settlers_alignment
					value = 4
				}
				IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
				
				add_timed_idea = { idea = IBR_6002_misc_costs days = 90 }
		
				custom_effect_tooltip = TNO_colonial_misc_costs_increase_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {IBR_colony_subsidies_misc_cost_var = 0.05}
			}
			else = {
				add_political_power = -25
				
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_settlers_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {
					var = IBR_settlers_alignment
					value = 4
				}
				IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
				
				add_timed_idea = { idea = IBR_6002_misc_costs days = 90 }
		
				custom_effect_tooltip = TNO_colonial_misc_costs_increase_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {IBR_colony_subsidies_misc_cost_var = 0.025}
			}
		}
		
		else = {
		
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mor_autonomy }
				
				add_political_power = -50
				
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_settlers_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {
					var = IBR_settlers_alignment
					value = 2
				}
				IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
				
				add_timed_idea = { idea = IBR_6002_misc_costs days = 90 }
		
				custom_effect_tooltip = TNO_colonial_misc_costs_increase_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {IBR_colony_subsidies_misc_cost_var = 0.05}
			}
			else = {
				add_political_power = -25
				
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_settlers_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {
					var = IBR_settlers_alignment
					value = 2
				}
				IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
				
				add_timed_idea = { idea = IBR_6002_misc_costs days = 90 }
		
				custom_effect_tooltip = TNO_colonial_misc_costs_increase_tt
				
				add_to_variable = {IBR_colony_subsidies_misc_cost_var = 0.025}
			}
		}
		
	}
	option = { #token concessions
		name = IBR.6002.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = red_carpet }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_settlers_tt
		
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_settlers_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		
		}
		else = {
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_settlers_tt
		
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_settlers_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The speech begins
	id = IBR.6005
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6005"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_airforce_hq
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6005.t
	desc = IBR.6005.d
	option = { #promise resources
		name = IBR.6005.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		add_political_power = -50
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_army_tt
		
		army_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
		army_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -13

#Salazar Church events

country_event = { #Salazar Enters Sanctuary of Fatima
	id = IBR.6008
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6008"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_sanctuary_fatima
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6008.t
	desc = IBR.6008.d
	option = { #Salazar talks about how he once considered becoming a priest
		name = IBR.6008.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10 
			
			modifier = {
				add = 40

				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
							has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
						}
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
							has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
						}
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar }
						}
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
			}
		}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.6009
					hours = 5
				}
		}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
				id = IBR.6010
				hours = 5
			}
		}
		}
		
	}
	option = { #Focus on the issues
		name = IBR.6008.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10 
			
			modifier = {
				add = 40

				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
							has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
						}
						has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar }
						}
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		    OR = {
				has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
			}
		}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
				id = IBR.6012
				hours = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.6011
					hours = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = majority_1
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = intellectuals_1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		set_country_flag = intellectuals_2 
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.6020
				hours = 5		
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Conclusion
	id = IBR.6020
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6020"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_salazar_writing_desk
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6020.t
	desc = IBR.6020.d
	option = { #A declaration that the educated will guide Iberia
		name = IBR.6020.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10 

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = majority_1
						has_country_flag = majority_2
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = intellectuals_1
						has_country_flag = intellectuals_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		AND = {
		has_country_flag = intellectuals_1
		has_country_flag = intellectuals_2
		}
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.6021
				days = 5	
			}
		}
		
		}
		else = {
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.6022
				days = 5	
			}
		}
		
		}
	}
	option = { #A declaration that the the common Iberian will lead the way
		name = IBR.6020.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10 

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = majority_1
						has_country_flag = majority_2
					}
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
							AND = {
								has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
								has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = intellectuals_1
						has_country_flag = intellectuals_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		AND = {
		has_country_flag = majority_1
		has_country_flag = majority_2
		}
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
		id = IBR.6023
		days = 5	
	    }
		}
		
		}
		else = {
		
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
		id = IBR.6022
		days = 5	
	    }
		}
		}
		
				
	}
}

country_event = { #The Ministry of National Education
	id = IBR.6024
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.6024"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_ministry_of_national_education
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.6024.t
	desc = IBR.6024.d
	option = { #Education will be prioritized
		name = IBR.6024.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 9
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_franco_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		set_country_flag = education_prio
		
		add_political_power = 30
	
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = 3
		}
		
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		social_funding_maximal_increase_med = yes
		social_funding_minimal_increase_med = yes
		
		TNO_improve_education_policy_effectiveness_monthly_med = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
		id = IBR.6025
			days = 1
	    }
		}
	}
	option = { #Promise to improve the situation somewhat
		name = IBR.6024.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 9
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
						has_country_flag = cau_salazar_lead
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		set_country_flag = education_improve
		
		add_political_power = 20
	
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		social_funding_maximal_increase_low = yes
		social_funding_minimal_increase_low = yes
		
		TNO_improve_education_policy_effectiveness_monthly_low = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
		id = IBR.6025
			days = 1
	    }
		}
	}
	option = { #Make no promises
		name = IBR.6024.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_franco_bureaucrats_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
		id = IBR.6025
			days = 1
	    }
		}
	}
}

###The Death of Salazar (falling off a chair lmao)

country_event = { #FLASHPOINT (SALAZAR DEATH)
	id = IBR.1020
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1020"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_salazar_sad_desk
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1020.t
	desc = IBR.1020.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		date > 1968.4.3
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1020.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		retire_character = IBR_Antonio_Salazar
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_political_power = -200 
		clear_variable = IBR_caudillo_correct_var
		clear_variable = IBR_caudillo_change_var
		set_country_flag = IBR_caudillo_mechanic_over
		set_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_dead
		set_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_transition
		
		clr_country_flag = cau_strong_franco
		clr_country_flag = cau_weak_franco
		clr_country_flag = cau_council
		clr_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
		clr_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
		
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_stability
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_economics
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_terrorism
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_foreign
		clr_country_flag = IBR_decisions_post_trium
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.468
				    days = 1
			    }
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					country_exists = SLG
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.3001
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
				has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
			}
		    subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = IBRIberiaStability
			    value = 5
		    }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_salazardeath_reallybig_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = advisory_council
						has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = legislature_council
						has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar
					}
				}
			}
		    subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = IBRIberiaStability
			    value = 4
		    }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_salazardeath_reallybig_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = advisory_council
						has_country_flag = cau_council
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = legislature_council
						has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar
					}
				}
			}
		    subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = IBRIberiaStability
			    value = 3
		    }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_salazardeath_big_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
		    subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = IBRIberiaStability
			    value = 2
		    }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_salazardeath_advfrancolol_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
		    subtract_from_variable = {
			    var = IBRIberiaStability
			    value = 1
		    }
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_salazardeath_smol_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union } 
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = IBR_STABILITY_ROUTE
						option = IBR_STABILITY_ROUTE_COLLAPSE
					}
				}
				IBR = { 
				    set_variable = { IBRIberiaStability = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						IBRIberiaStability < 1
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
					id = IBR.1021
					days = 3
					}
				}
			} 
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { IBRIberiaStability < 8 }
					check_variable = { IBRIberiaStability > 0.9 }
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = IBRElectionsYES
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_divorce_decision_tt 
				set_country_flag = IBR_divorce_decision_flag 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						IBR = { 
							is_ai = yes
						}
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.3003
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.4059
						days = 15
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR_Marcelo_Caetano = {
				set_nationality = POR
			}
			POR = {
				kill_country_leader = yes
				add_country_leader_role = {
					character = IBR_Marcelo_Caetano
					promote_leader = yes
					country_leader = {
						ideology = despotism_civilian_dictatorship_subtype
						expire = "1981.10.20"
					}
				}
			}
	    }
		hidden_effect = {
		    IBR = {
				promote_character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
		    	remove_country_leader_trait = strong_franco_trait
				remove_country_leader_trait = weak_franco_trait
				hidden_effect = {
					IBR = {
						remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
					}
				}
				add_ideas = IBR_Iberian_Council_dep
			}

			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union } 
				}
				load_focus_tree = {
					tree = IBR_death_of_salazar
					keep_completed = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {has_country_flag = cau_strong_franco}
				
				set_country_flag = death_strong_franco
				
				#swap_ideas = {
				#	remove_idea = IBR_Antonio_Salazar_dep
				#	add_idea = IBR_Iberian_Council_dep
				#}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {has_country_flag = cau_weak_franco}
				
				set_country_flag = death_weak_franco
				
				#swap_ideas = {
				#	remove_idea = IBR_Antonio_Salazar_dep
				#	add_idea = IBR_Iberian_Council_dep
				#}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar}
				
				set_country_flag = death_weak_salazar
				
				#swap_ideas = {
				#	remove_idea = IBR_Francisco_Franco_dep
				#	add_idea = IBR_Iberian_Council_dep
				#}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar}
				
				set_country_flag = death_strong_salazar
				
				#swap_ideas = {
				#	remove_idea = IBR_Francisco_Franco_dep
				#	add_idea = IBR_Iberian_Council_dep
				#}
			}
		}
	}
}

##Event for Salazar's death killing the Union

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1021
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1021"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_portugal_building_crowd
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1021.t
	desc = IBR.1021.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1021.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
			id = IBR.1112
			days = 3
		}
		}
	}
}

###The Union Is Dissolved
country_event = { #divorce 74 (good ending auth/despotist union)
	id = IBR.1110
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1110"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1110.t
	desc = IBR.1110.d

	option = {
		name = IBR.1110.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		load_focus_tree = IBR_letting_go_tree
		set_variable = {
			IBRPortugalAnger = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBRSpainAnger = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBRColonialBalance = 0
			# negative = portugal biased, positive = spain biased
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBREconomicBalance = 0
			# negative = portugal biased, positive = spain biased
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBREconomicStrength = 0
			# How durable both economies are to start with
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBRMilitaryBalance = 0
			# negative = portugal biased, positive = spain biased
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR_remove_all_ideas = yes
			add_ideas = Dissolving_Iberian_Union
			set_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union
			POR = { 
				add_state_core = 1004
				add_state_core = 179
				add_state_core = 1000
				add_state_core = 112
				add_state_core = 998
				add_state_core = 181
				add_state_core = 180
				add_state_core = 997
				add_state_core = 698
				add_state_core = 697
			}
			SPA = { 
				add_state_core = 983
				add_state_core = 982
				add_state_core = 171
				add_state_core = 165
				add_state_core = 986
				add_state_core = 1012
				add_state_core = 987
				add_state_core = 167
				add_state_core = 177
				add_state_core = 168
				add_state_core = 993
				add_state_core = 984
				add_state_core = 985
				add_state_core = 166
				add_state_core = 172
				add_state_core = 994
				add_state_core = 1013
				add_state_core = 41
				add_state_core = 1002
				add_state_core = 175
				add_state_core = 999
				add_state_core = 996
				add_state_core = 995
				add_state_core = 174
				add_state_core = 176
				add_state_core = 1001
				add_state_core = 170
				add_state_core = 169
				add_state_core = 173
				add_state_core = 988
				add_state_core = 1003
				add_state_core = 118
				add_state_core = 178
			}
		}
	}
}

###Temporary Iberian Wars Trigger

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1112
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1112"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.1112.t
	desc = IBR.1112.d
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = IBRDemUnion }
			has_country_flag = IBRWarbyDebug
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1112.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberiawars.1
				days = 1
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = IBR_iberian_wars_happening
		set_country_flag = IBR_in_crisis
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Terrorism_GUI 
		clr_country_flag = country_has_gui 
		set_country_flag = IBRCNTBroken
		set_country_flag = IBRETABroken
		set_country_flag = IBRTBABroken
		set_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
		clr_country_flag = IBRWarbyDebug
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1113
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1113"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1113.t
	desc = IBR.1113.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1113.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Keep Northern Morocco, Algeria, and Rio de Oro.
		set_country_flag = IBRTransferWestAfrica1
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1113.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Keep Northern Morocco and Algeria, give them everything else
		set_country_flag = IBRTransferWestAfrica2
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRColonialBalance
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSpainAnger
			value = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1113.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Spain keeps everything lol
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRColonialBalance
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRPortugalAnger
			value = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1118
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1118"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1118.t
	desc = IBR.1118.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1118.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Bias it in favor of Spain
		set_country_flag = IBRStockpilesSpainBias
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRPortugalAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryBalance
			value = 1
		}
		set_equipment_fraction = 0.5
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1118.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Bias it in favor of Portugal
		set_country_flag = IBRStockpilesPortugalBias
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSpainAnger
			value = 1
		}
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryBalance
			value = 1
		}
		set_equipment_fraction = 0.5
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1118.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Let's Play Fair.
		set_equipment_fraction = 0.5
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1119
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1119"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no

	desc = IBR.1119.d

		name = IBR.1119.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

		set_country_flag = IBROfficersSpainBias
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryBalance
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRPortugalAnger
			value = 1
		}
		set_equipment_fraction = 0.5
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1119.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Prefer Portuguese military experience
		set_country_flag = IBROfficersPortugalBias
		subtract_from_variable = {
			var = IBRMilitaryBalance
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSpainAnger
			value = 1
		}
		set_equipment_fraction = 0.5
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1119.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# 
		set_country_flag = IBRStockpilesPortugalBias
		set_equipment_fraction = 0.5
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1120
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1120"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1120.t
	desc = IBR.1120.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1120.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Prefer Spanish companies
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRPortugalAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBREconomicBalance
			value = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1120.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Prefer Portuguese companies
		set_country_flag = IBRCompaniesPortugalBias
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSpainAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBREconomicBalance
			value = -1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1120.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Try to find balance
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBREconomicStrength
			value = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.1121
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.1121"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_letting_go
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.1121.t
	desc = IBR.1121.d
	option = {
		name = IBR.1121.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# No port leasing
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1121.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Portugal will lease ports to spain
		set_country_flag = IBRPortLeasingPTS
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRPortugalAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBREconomicBalance
			value = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1121.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		#Spain will lease ports to Portugal
		set_country_flag = IBRPortLeasingSTP
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSpainAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBREconomicBalance
			value = -1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.1121.e
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		# Both will lease ports
		set_country_flag = IBRPortLeasingPTS
		set_country_flag = IBRPortLeasingSTP
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRPortugalAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRSpainAnger
			value = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBREconomicStrength
			value = 1
		}
	}
}

	id = IBR.2000

				set_country_flag = POR_divorce_happened

				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBREconomicBalance
						value = -1
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				SPA = {
					add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = -0.7}
				}
				POR = {
					add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = 0.7}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBREconomicBalance
						value = -2
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				SPA = {
					add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = -1.4}
				}
				POR = {
					add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = 1.4}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					var = IBREconomicStrength
					value = 2
					compare = equals
				}
			}
			SPA = {
				add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = 1}
			}
			POR = {
				add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = 1}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						var = IBREconomicStrength
						value = 1
						compare = equals
					}
				}
				SPA = {
					add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = 0.5}
				}
				POR = {
					add_to_variable = {GDP_growth = 0.5}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			news_event = {
				id = WORLD.491
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = IBR.2001
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.2001"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes

		name = IBR.2001.a

	}

		add_political_power = 50
		IBR = { join_zollverein = yes }
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
		        news_event = {
				    id = WORLD.502
				    days = 1
			    }
		    }
		}
	}
}

		IBR = {
			white_peace = SLG
			transfer_state = 1006
			transfer_state = 459
			puppet = SLG
		}
		SLG = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = despotism
			}
			add_ideas = {
				SLG_Orlando_Cristina_hog
				SLG_Federico_Gomez_sec
				SLG_Cirilo_Canovas_Garcia_eco
				SLG_Baltasar_Rebelo_de_Sousa_for
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 1403
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 1403
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 1404
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 1404
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 1405
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 1405
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 1406
				}
				remove_unit_leader = 1406
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			promote_character = SLG_Federico_Gomez_Salazar
			set_popularities = {
				despotism = 50
				authoritarian_democracy = 20
				fascism = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Accident at the Dam
	id = IBR.3148
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3148" }
	title = IBR.3148.t
	desc = IBR.3148.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_dam_generic
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3148.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { IBR_dam_workers > 3 }
					check_variable = { IBR_dam_workers < 2 }
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_dam_workers = -3 }
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = {IBR_dam_workers = 0 }
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_gibdam_workersangry
		
	}
}

####LISBON FLOOD EVENT CHAIN

country_event = { #An Evening in the Mud
	id = IBR.3149
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3149" }
	title = IBR.3149.t
	desc = IBR.3149.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_lisbon_flood_mother_girl
	
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		date > 1967.11.25
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3149.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		
		#Several factories as well as a few levels of infrastructure in Lisbon are badly damaged. 
        #GDP drops by 1%. Relief set to 1, censor to 0, support to 6, and loss.jpg to 200.
		
		112 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 0.8
			}
		}
		
		112 = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_state_value_addition = -0.043 } #already converted to billion
			econ_state_value_change_addition_specified_state = yes
		}
		
		set_variable = {
			IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_lisbonflood_censor = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_lisbonflood_support = 6
		}
		set_variable = {
			IBR_lisbonflood_loss = 200
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3150
				hours = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Breaking News from Lisbon
	id = IBR.3150
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3150" }
	title = IBR.3150.t
	desc = IBR.3150.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_lisbon_flood 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Franco's Plan: Respond Immediately
		name = IBR.3150.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_political_power = -25
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.06 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 1 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3151
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Salazar's Plan: Gather Information First
		name = IBR.3150.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.02 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3151
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Volunteers
	id = IBR.3151
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3151" }
	title = IBR.3151.t
	desc = IBR.3151.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_lisbon_flood_volunteers 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Do Nothing
		name = IBR.3151.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3152
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Encourage Volunteers
		name = IBR.3151.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.04 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 1 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3152
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Send Army
		name = IBR.3151.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.11 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = { 
			type = support_equipment
			amount  = -100
		}
		
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 2 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 4 }
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.3153
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.3152
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Mud, Mildew, and Misery
	id = IBR.3152
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3152" }
	title = IBR.3152.t
	desc = IBR.3152.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_lisbon_flood_bad_conditions
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3152.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3154
				days = 3
			}
		}

country_event = { #Lisbon Homelessness Crisis
	id = IBR.30155
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.30155" }
	title = IBR.30155.t
	desc = IBR.30155.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_lisbon_flood_ruins
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #Delegate
		name = IBR.30155.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_support = -1 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief > 4 }
					has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.30158
					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.30157
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Extend funding
		name = IBR.30155.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.052 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 1 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief > 4 }
					has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.30158
					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.30157
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Subsidize construction
		name = IBR.30155.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.193 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief = 2 }
		add_to_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_support = 1 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { IBR_lisbonflood_relief > 4 }
					has_country_flag = IBRFSLPBroken
				}
			}
			
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.30158
					days = 14
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = IBR.30157
					days = 7
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = IBR.3169.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_spanish_police_car
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3169.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.3170
				days = 380
			}
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_munos_grandes
	
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		date > 1969.7.12
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3203.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = advisory_council } 
		retire_character = IBR_Agustin_Munoz_Grandes
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			}
		}
		add_ideas = IBR_Fernando_Santos_mil
	}
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3203.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { has_country_flag = legislature_council }
		retire_character = IBR_Agustin_Munoz_Grandes 
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			}
		}
		add_ideas = IBR_Fernando_Santos_mil
	}
}

			var = IBR_foreign_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.04 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.4 } #already converted to percent
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
	}
	option = { #franco plan
		name = IBR.3213.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		
		add_political_power = 10
		
		set_temp_variable = { temp_econ_spending_amount = 0.005 } 
		econ_spend_money_once_effect_raw_money = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Death of Franco
	id = IBR.3234
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.3234" }
	title = IBR.3234.t
	desc = IBR.3234.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_franco_dead
	
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		date > 1974.6.5
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3234.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { has_government = authoritarian_democracy }
	}
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3234.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { has_government = conservative_democracy }
	}
	option = { #
		name = IBR.3234.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_government = liberal_democracy
				 			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4008
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4008"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_empty_plate
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4008.t
	desc = IBR.4008.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4008.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
        if = { 
        limit = { 
            has_country_flag = legislature_council
        }
        add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
        custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_15
    	}
		if = { 
        limit = { 
            has_country_flag = advisory_council
        }
        add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
        custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_10
    	}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		country_event = { 
			id = IBR.4009
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4008.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		
		social_funding_maximal_increase_low = yes
		social_funding_minimal_increase_low = yes
		
		TNO_improve_unemployment_policy_effectiveness_monthly_low = yes
		
		 if = { 
        limit = { 
            has_country_flag = legislature_council
        }
        add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2}
        custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_16
    	}
		if = { 
        limit = { 
            has_country_flag = advisory_council
        }
        add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
        custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_11
    	}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		IBR_improve_majority_opinion = yes 
		
		
		country_event = { 
			id = IBR.4009
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4010
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4010"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_water_tap
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4010.t
	desc = IBR.4010.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4010.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_17
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -1}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_10
    	}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		country_event = { 
			id = IBR.4011
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4010.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		
		social_funding_maximal_increase_low = yes
		social_funding_minimal_increase_low = yes
		TNO_improve_pollution_policy_effectiveness_med = yes
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_18
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_11
    	}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = improve_poverty_small
		add_to_variable = { poverty_monthly_change = 0.05 }
		
		IBR_improve_majority_opinion = yes 
		IBR_worsen_business_opinion = yes
		
		country_event = { 
			id = IBR.4011
			days = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = IBR.4011
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4011"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_lisbon_working_class_neighborhood
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4011.t
	desc = IBR.4011.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4011.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_19
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_10
    	}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		IBR_add_5_marklib = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4011.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		
		TNO_improve_unemployment_policy_effectiveness_monthly_low = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = improve_poverty_small
		add_to_variable = { poverty_monthly_change = 0.05 }
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_20
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_11
    	}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		IBR_improve_majority_opinion = yes 
		IBR_worsen_business_opinion = yes
		IBR_add_5_soclib = yes
		
		#custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_government_state_tt
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = IBR.4012
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4012"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_algeria_natives
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4012.t
	desc = IBR.4012.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4012.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
		TNO_improve_minorities_policy_effectiveness_med = yes
		
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_21
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_11
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		IBR_improve_native_opinion = yes
		IBR_worsen_settlers_opinion = yes
		IBR_add_3_soclib = yes
		hidden_effect = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = IBR.4013 
				days = 1
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4012.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_10
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_22
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		IBR_worsen_native_opinion = yes
		IBR_add_5_soccon = yes
	}
}

	title = IBR.4015.t
	desc = IBR.4015.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4015.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = { 
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.4016 
						days = 1
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = IBR.4018 
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}	
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4100
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4100"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_road_work_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	title = IBR.4100.t
	desc = IBR.4100.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		has_global_flag = france_invaded
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4100.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.4101
				days = 7
			}
		}
		IBR = {
			country_event = {
				id = IBR.3213
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4106
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4106"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_salazar_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4106.t
	desc = IBR.4106.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4106.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_algeria_tt
		
		complete_national_focus = IBR_General_Kaulza_Plan
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_military_alignment = 5}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_franco_army_tt
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		set_country_flag = IBR_Algeria_War_Path
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4106.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = no }	
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_algeria_tt
		
		complete_national_focus = IBR_Ambassador_Moreira_Plan	
		
		add_to_variable = {IBR_business_alignment = -5}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_businessmen_tt
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = IBR.4106.c
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		trigger = { is_ai = yes }
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ALGERIAN_CRISIS
					option = ALGERIAN_CRISIS_PEACE
				}
			}
			complete_national_focus = IBR_Ambassador_Moreira_Plan
		
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ALGERIAN_CRISIS
					option = ALGERIAN_CRISIS_WAR
				}
			}
			complete_national_focus = IBR_General_Kaulza_Plan 
			set_country_flag = IBR_Algeria_War_Path
		
		}
		else_if = { #Franco made war more likely
			limit = { 
				IBR = { 
					has_country_leader = { 
						character = IBR_Francisco_Franco
						ruling_only = yes
					} 
				} 
			}
			if = { #Burgundy made war more likely
				limit = { has_country_flag = BRG_false_flagged }
				random_list = {
					5 = { complete_national_focus = IBR_Ambassador_Moreira_Plan }
					95 = { 
						complete_national_focus = IBR_General_Kaulza_Plan 
						set_country_flag = IBR_Algeria_War_Path
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random_list = {
					10 = { complete_national_focus = IBR_Ambassador_Moreira_Plan }
					90 = { 
						complete_national_focus = IBR_General_Kaulza_Plan 
						set_country_flag = IBR_Algeria_War_Path
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = { #Burgundy made war more likely
				limit = { has_country_flag = BRG_false_flagged }
				random_list = {
					65 = { complete_national_focus = IBR_Ambassador_Moreira_Plan }
					35 = { 
						complete_national_focus = IBR_General_Kaulza_Plan 
						set_country_flag = IBR_Algeria_War_Path
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random_list = {
					75 = { complete_national_focus = IBR_Ambassador_Moreira_Plan }
					25 = { 
						complete_national_focus = IBR_General_Kaulza_Plan
						set_country_flag = IBR_Algeria_War_Path
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4107
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4107"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_jardim_serious
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4107.t
	desc = IBR.4107.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4107.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		
		add_political_power = 25
		
		IBR_worsen_settlers_opinion = yes
		IBR_improve_foreign_opinion = yes
		IBR_worsen_burocrats_opinion = yes
		
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4108
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4108"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_ENI_logo
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4108.t
	desc = IBR.4108.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4108.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		
		if = {
		limit = { ITA = { has_country_flag = ITA_algeria_blocked_war } }
		
		hidden_effect = {
		random_list = {
		
			90 = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.4109
					days = 5
				}
			}
			10 = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.4110
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		}
		}
		else = {
		
		hidden_effect = {
		random_list = {
		
			90 = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.4110
					days = 5
				}
			}
			10 = {
				country_event = { 
					id = IBR.4109
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = IBR.4109
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event IBR.4109"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_ENI_logo
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = IBR.4109.t
	desc = IBR.4109.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = IBR.4109.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }	
		
		add_political_power = 50
		
		add_resource = {
    		type = oil
    		amount = 15
    		state = 459
		}
		
		IBR_improve_business_opinion = yes
		IBR_improve_settlers_opinion = yes
	}
}

			}
		}
	}

################################################################################ 
country_event = {
	id = caudillo.1 #Test
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event caudillo.1"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_franco_salazar_otp
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = caudillo.1.t
	desc = caudillo.1.d
	option = {
		name = caudillo.1.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes	
		set_variable = {
			var = IBR_caudillo_change_var
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			var = IBR_caudillo_correct_var
			value = 1
		}
		if = {
		    limit =  { is_ai = yes }
			
			random_list = {
			    25 = {set_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI}
				
				25 = {set_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI}
				
				50 = {set_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI}
			}
		}
	} 
} 
country_event = {
	id = caudillo.2 #Test
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event caudillo.2"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_dinosaur
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = caudillo.2.t
	desc = caudillo.2.d
	option = {
		name = caudillo.2.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		set_variable = { #20 to -20
					IBR_military_alignment = -20
				}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes	
		
	} 
} 

country_event = {
	id = caudillo.3 #AI Test
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event caudillo.3"
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes	
		}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_dinosaur
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = no
	hidden = no
	title = caudillo.3.t
	desc = caudillo.3.desc
	option = {
		name = caudillo.3.a
	} 
	option = { #Set to Salazar
		name = caudillo.3.b
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
		set_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
	}
	option = { #Set to Neutral
		name = caudillo.3.c
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
		set_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
	}
	option = { #Set to Franco
		name = caudillo.3.d
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Neutral_AI
		clr_country_flag = IBR_Salazar_AI
		set_country_flag = IBR_Franco_AI
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = iberia.1 #Goa situation
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.1"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_goa_map
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.1.t
	desc = iberia.1.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_foreignpolicy_tt
		
		country_event = {
    		id = iberia.2
    		days = 4
		}
	} 
	option = {
		name = iberia.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_cauinfo_foreignpolicy_tt
		
		IND = { 
		country_event = {
    		id = iberia.9
    		days = 4
			} 
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = iberia.5 #Anjediva Trial
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.5"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_garrison_commander
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.5.t
	desc = iberia.5.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.5.a

		add_political_power = 50
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_37
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_26
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberia.36
				days = 13
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = iberia.8 #press discovers bribing
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.8"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_portuguese_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.8.t
	desc = iberia.8.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.8.a

		add_political_power = -125
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_38
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_27
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_foreign_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_foreign_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_bureaucrats_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_burocrat_alignment
			value = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_big_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberia.36
				days = 13
			}
		}
	}
}  
country_event = {
	id = iberia.9 #Iberia demands compensation
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.9"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_salazar_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.9.t
	desc = iberia.9.d

country_event = {
	id = iberia.13 #India tricks us
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.13"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_meeting_table
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.13.t
	desc = iberia.13.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.13.a

		add_political_power = -50
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_foreign_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_foreign_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 0.5
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberia.36
				days = 13
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = iberia.15.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.15.a

		add_political_power = 25
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -1}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_39
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_28
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberia.36
				days = 13
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = iberia.29 #GOA CONFERENCE IBR
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.29"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_indian_soldiers_on_stage
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.29.t
	desc = iberia.29.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.29.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_41
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 3}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_30
			}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
		if = {
			limit = {has_country_flag = IBR_india_gave_money}
			
			add_political_power = 100
			
			set_temp_variable = { money_reserves_temp = 0.13 } 
			econ_money_reserves_change_raw_money = yes
			
			set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.3 } #already converted to percent
			econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_foreign_tt
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_foreign_alignment
				value = -3
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_businessmen_tt
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_business_alignment
				value = -3
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_majority_tt
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_majority_alignment
				value = -1
			}
			IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1.5
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
			
		}
		else = {
		
			add_political_power = 75
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_foreign_tt
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_foreign_alignment
				value = -2
			}
			
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_businessmen_tt
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBR_business_alignment
				value = -3
			}
			IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
			
			set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.2 } #already converted to percent
			econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
			
			add_to_variable = {
				var = IBRIberiaStability
				value = 1
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_india_gave_money
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberia.36
				days = 13
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = iberia.31 #GOA FORUM IBR
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.31"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_goa_building
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.31.t
	desc = iberia.31.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.31.a
		if = { 
		limit = { 
			has_country_flag = legislature_council
		}
		add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 4}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_41
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 4}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_30
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		add_political_power = 100
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_foreign_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_foreign_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_businessmen_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_business_alignment
			value = -3
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = -1
		}
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		set_temp_variable = { gdp_growth_temp = 0.1 } #already converted to percent
		econ_gdp_growth_change = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = 2
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_big_tt
		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = iberia.36
				days = 13
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}

			hidden_effect = { 
				country_event = {
					id = iberia.46
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar }

				random_list = { 
					25 = { 
						IBR = { 
							country_event = {
							id = iberia.45
							days = 5
							}
						}
					} 
					75 = { 
						IBR = { 
							country_event = {
							id = iberia.46
							days = 5
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = { 
					50 = { 
						IBR = { 
							country_event = {
							id = iberia.45
							days = 5
							}
						}
					} 
					50 = { 
						IBR = { 
							country_event = {
							id = iberia.46
							days = 5
							}
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	} 
	option = {
		name = iberia.40.c 
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		IBR = { 
		country_event = {
    		id = iberia.47
    		days = 5
			}
		}
	}

				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = {
				random_list = { 
					50 = { 
						IBR = { 
							country_event = {
								id = iberia.51
								days = 5
							}
						}
					}
					50 = { 
						IBR = { 
							country_event = {
								id = iberia.52
								days = 5
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
} 

country_event = { #Protests Against the Government
	id = iberia.51 
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.51"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_portuguese_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.51.t
	desc = iberia.51.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.51.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_47
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_34
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		add_political_power = -50
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 1
		}
		
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBRIberiaStability
			value = -1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
	}
}

	id = iberia.82

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no

	desc = iberia.82.d
	option = { #Stop Suzuki, a trade war is not worth it
		name = iberia.82.a

			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
					IBR = { has_country_flag = cau_weak_salazar }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 90
					IBR = { has_country_flag = cau_strong_salazar }
			}
		}

    		id = iberia.86
    		days = 4
			}			
		}

		}

country_event = { #Captain Galvão Speaks Out Against the Caudillos
	id = iberia.300 
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.300"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_galvao
	is_triggered_only = no
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.300.t
	desc = iberia.300.d
	trigger = {
		tag = IBR
		date > 1963.12.2
		NOT = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = IBR_dissolving_the_union 
				has_country_flag = IBR_Iberian_Wars_have_happened
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Speak to his commanding officer
		name = iberia.300.a 
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.301
    		days = 4
			}			
		}
		}
	}
	option = { #Ignore it
		name = iberia.300.b 
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.303
    		days = 13
			}			
		}
		}
	}
}

	id = iberia.302

	picture = GFX_report_event_italy_naval_ship
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.302.t
	desc = iberia.302.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.302.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = legislature_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_34_2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -2}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_23_2
			}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_army_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = {

    		id = iberia.303
    		days = 5
			}			
		}
		}
	}

    		days = 20
			}			
		}
		}
	}
	option = { #There are Americans on board, ask the US for help!
		name = iberia.303.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 5}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_34
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_23
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		USA = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.304
    		days = 3
			}			
		}
	}

country_event = { #Hijackers Broadcast Speech from Cuba
	id = iberia.307 
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.307"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_galvao2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.307.t
	desc = iberia.307.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.307.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = legislature_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 7}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_34_3
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -4}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_23_3
			}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		add_political_power = -50
		
		subtract_from_variable = {
		    var = IBRIberiaStability
		   	value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 1
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_foreign_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_foreign_alignment
			value = 1
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_army_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.308
    		days = 10
			}			
		}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Salazar Pushes Involvement in South African War"
	id = iberia.309 
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.309"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_iberia_salazar_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.309.t
	desc = iberia.309.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.309.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		
		if = {
			limit = {has_country_flag = IBR_US_hostages}
		
			hidden_effect = { 
				country_event = {
				id = iberia.310
				days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			
			hidden_effect = { 
				country_event = {
				id = iberia.311
				days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = IBR_US_hostages
	}
}

	option = {
		name = iberia.311.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		
		USA = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.312
    		days = 4
			}			
		}
	}
}

			tree = IBR_South_Africa
			keep_completed = yes
		}
		complete_national_focus = IBR_Returning_the_favor
		
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = USA
			modifier = IBR_SAF_support
		}
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = SAF
			modifier = IBR_SAF_support
		}
	}
} 

##Post South Africa War Events##

country_event = { #Victory in Africa
	id = iberia.314 
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.314"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_south_african_war_us_soldier4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no
	title = iberia.314.t
	desc = iberia.314.d
	option = { #Ask the Americans for the colonies
		name = iberia.314.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		
		add_political_power = 75

		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 4}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_35
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = advisory_council
				}
				add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 3}
				custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_24
			}
			IBR_council_clamp = yes
		
		add_to_variable = {
		    var = IBRIberiaStability
		    value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_add_stability_small_tt
		TNO_clear_num_volunteers = yes
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = -2
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_foreign_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_foreign_alignment
			value = -3
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_improve_salazar_army_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = -4
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		USA = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.315
    		days = 3
			}			
		}
	}
	option = { #There is no way that will go well
		name = iberia.314.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = 4}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_35
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = 3}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_24
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		TNO_clear_num_volunteers = yes
		hidden_effect = {
		IBR = { 
			country_event = {
    		id = iberia.317
    		days = 14
			}			
		}
		}
	}
}

	id = iberia.319 
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event iberia.319"}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = no

	desc = iberia.319.d
	option = {
		name = iberia.319.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = legislature_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_reformism = -2}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_reformist_tt_36
			}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = advisory_council
			}
			add_to_variable = {IBR_council_influence = -5}
			custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_influence_tt_25
		}
		IBR_council_clamp = yes
		add_political_power = -50
		
		subtract_from_variable = {
		    var = IBRIberiaStability
		    value = 1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_sub_stability_small_tt
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_majority_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_majority_alignment
			value = 2
		}
		
		custom_effect_tooltip = IBR_worsen_salazar_army_tt
		
		add_to_variable = {
			var = IBR_military_alignment
			value = 4
		}
		IBR_check_caudillo_popularity = yes
		TNO_clear_num_volunteers = yes
	}
}

				}

	hidden = no

	desc = iberia.325.d
	trigger = {
		1035 = {
			is_controlled_by = ANG
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = iberia.325.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 } 
		
		add_political_power = 25
		ANG = {
			random_owned_state = {
				limit = { state = 1035 }
				set_temp_variable = { state_value_multiplier_temp = 0.95 }
				econ_state_value_change_multiply = yes
			}
		}		
	}
}

	id = ibrwar.19
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ibrwar.19"}
 	title = ibrwar.19.t
 	desc = ibrwar.19.d
 	picture = GFX_report_event_lithuania_army
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
 	
 	option = {
 		name = ibrwar.19.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
 	}
}

####Federales tree events, no clue why the previous events are there but I don't dare delete or reuse them

country_event = {
	id = ibrwar.43
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ibrwar.43"}
 	title = ibrwar.43.t
 	desc = ibrwar.43.d
 	picture = GFX_report_event_lithuania_army
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
 	
 	option = {
		name = ibrwar.43.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_political_power = 50
		add_ideas = ibrwar_legitimate_government
 	}
}

country_event = {
	id = ibrwar.44
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ibrwar.44"}
 	title = ibrwar.44.t
 	desc = ibrwar.44.d
 	picture = GFX_report_event_lithuania_army
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
 	
 	option = {
 		name = ibrwar.44.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				1005 = {
					owner = {
						NOT = { 
							OR ={
								tag = IBR
								has_war_with = IBR
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			1005 = {
				owner = {
					IBR = {
						declare_war_on = {
							target = PREV
							type = annex_everything
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		load_oob = Iberian_Wars_IBR_settlers
 	}
	option = {
		name = ibrwar.44.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_manpower = 5000
	}
}

	id = ibrwar.45

country_event = {
	id = ibrwar.46
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ibrwar.46"}
 	title = ibrwar.46.t
 	desc = ibrwar.46.d
 	picture = GFX_report_event_lithuania_army
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
 	
 	option = {
		name = ibrwar.46.a
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -5000
			producer = ITA
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = ibrwar.47
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	 }
	 option = {
		name = ibrwar.46.b
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			IBR = {
				country_event = {
					id = ibrwar.48
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	 }
}
